  freestar.config = freestar.config || {};

        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="13266" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="13266" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.11</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="2009">2,009</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="212"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Juniper Sling</b> by <b>Penhaligon's</b> is a Woody Spicy fragrance for women and men. <b>Juniper Sling</b> was launched in 2011. The nose behind this fragrance is Olivier Cresp. Top notes are Juniper Berries, Orange, Angelica and Cinnamon; middle notes are Pepper, Cardamom, Leather and Orris Root; base notes are Vetiver, Sugar, Cherry and Amber. </p><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a href="https://www.fragrantica.de/Parfum/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html" target="_blank" display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.86862915010152; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.44.jpg" style="width: 3.125rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Angelica-44.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Angelica</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.7475514178297; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.65.jpg" style="width: 2.55rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Cinnamon-65.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Cinnamon</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Middle Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="middle"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.94222822930411; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.158.jpg" style="width: 3.575rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Pepper-158.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Pepper</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.86407633150587; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.63.jpg" style="width: 3.1rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Cardamom-63.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Cardamom</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.75364609430049; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.156.jpg" style="width: 2.575rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Leather-156.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Leather</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.73508893593265; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.101.jpg" style="width: 2.5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Orris-Root-101.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Orris Root</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Base Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="base"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.90318300578584; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.2.jpg" style="width: 3.325rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Vetiver-2.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Vetiver</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.78843493436923; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.200.jpg" style="width: 2.725rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Sugar-200.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Sugar</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.74136644894489; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.297.jpg" style="width: 2.525rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Cherry-297.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Cherry</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.73508893593265; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.54.jpg" style="width: 2.5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Amber-54.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Amber</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level></pyramid-switch></div></div><div class="cell text-center"><button class="button small" data-open="NotesRatingModal">Vote for Ingredients</button></div></div><notes-rating :perfume_id="13266"></notes-rating></div><div class="cell small-12"><vue-encrypt-postscribe slotid='88f3abd143039871cf605e17c860397c541' slotpayload='{"ct":"+ab5DwWiG7jQ6kYfzzqGWXjXK7vqr0pDsqanmPQP7vN0ZxGe9SPmuODye\/D1zRoy2LO33wFQutPHT\/p08wB6xLRy8TMPPE6k32uM4ZRPU6tcv068Txeeh78w5mf\/i45QY+RNvS68rGOVBZUg5jzQW1Vie44I2ygoCtyVxzSo\/MhSka4s6DqgDVMNxhHfr8p311d+HI1ShLL6BpqYpDNdxn1O33vfNYIKmjeffHN5HtvY4M6ws3QVg5deSTSF3s+pZStCYAy+lUiSKvtRNJknZ2l6T2OkiOdG3LY7SnhXRMTqA1Uek6cPnOO\/si4w5JuH","iv":"81b10b5184283e6b68876eb116002111","s":"e8bf19038333b626"}'></vue-encrypt-postscribe></div><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-padding-y"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_3 -->

    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2358546" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2358546" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Isomies"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1182455"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1182455.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Isomies" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Santa-Maria-Novella/Vetiver-11459.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.11459.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vetiver"title="Vetiver"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2358546ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2358546" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1182455">Isomies</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-23">11/23/24 07:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>During these thirteen years living of Juniper Sling existence, there's being issue at it's longevity and performing on skin. It's not a fault of Penhaligon's only, just because the fixatives will not keep the juniperry molecules on skin more time as they intend to do naturally. Not even with Iso-e or any other synthetics. As always with these weak performers, I've found better results for performance when changing the Edt/colognes to "parfumes" mixed with oils, instead of alcoholic bases. These two, absolutely scent jewels; PH;s Juniper Sling and Aqcua Di Parma's Ginepro Di Gardenia with I'm now waiting a versions from Middle Eastern manufacturers (two individual houses), who have creater a promising test patches for both classics! I will report and inform when getting desent authentic versions with BETTER longevity enough with! </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="2358546"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=2358546#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2337691" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2336514" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LiaJet2000"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1595568"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="LiaJet2000" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2336514ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2336514" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1595568">LiaJet2000</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-03">11/03/24 05:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>There is an unmistakable alcoholic beverage accord in this scent, but it is mostly covered by sweet musks.<br />
The juniper gin smell comes through, but it's mostly the musks that ring out.<br />
These are the type of musks you find in very femme scents.<br />
Not offensive or overpowering.<br />
It stays close to the skin and doesn't fill the room, the people I was with didn't even detect it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="2336514"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=2336514#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2329791" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2270326" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SmellSharpe"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1447620"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1447620.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="SmellSharpe" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Prada-L-Homme-39029.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39029.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Prada L'Homme"title="Prada L'Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2270326ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2270326" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1447620">SmellSharpe</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-03">09/03/24 11:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells amazing. Like a very citrusy gin and tonic. 100% unisex.<br />
<br />
But unfortunately it lasts a matter of minutes and barely projects. AND it is super expensive for such a light summer scent. Very poor performance for a $200 fragrance.<br />
<br />
Dior Homme Cologne is a much better alternative as it at least lasts a while and projects. Hell, Tommy Bahama St. Barts lasts as long as Juniper Sling and is only 1/10th the price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="2270326"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=2270326#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2263239" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It is also a more luxurious and elegant fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="2263239"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=2263239#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2254835" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Beautiful scent, money better spent on getting a really nice gin instead.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="2254835"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=2254835#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2252113" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2252113" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Enrium"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/36833"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.36833.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Enrium" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Glossier/You-46885.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46885.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="You"title="You"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2252113ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2252113" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/36833">Enrium</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-17">08/17/24 06:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Juniper Sling is a high-quality freshie, in keeping with the best of Penhaligon's offerings. An aromatic woody scent, it is predictably juniper-dominant, and is deeply satisfying throughout. <br />
<br />
JS opens with radiantly fresh juniper, its fizzy freshness bringing to mind a gin &amp; tonic initially. It quickly becomes green and aromatic, its pine nuance evocative of juniper bush covered in berries. The artemisia enhances the greenness, keeping things aromatic but giving it a herbal nuance. Some tart orange adds to the freshness, but juniper is king here. Peppery spice emerges after a little while, with some savoury cardamom evident alongside the more prominent black pepper.<br />
<br />
As it develops, the vetiver comes to the fore, its dry woodiness the perfect complement to the aromatic opening. I get a prominent sugar cube note here too, an unexpected and unusual inclusion that somehow fits well. A light amber nuance comes to the fore as it dries down, softly musky and sweet, thanks in part to the sugar. It remains freshly spicy and aromatic as it fades, fresh until the end. Sillage is intimate and longevity is weak. It is a unisex spring/summer daytime freshie.<br />
<br />
A high-quality, beautifully-composed aromatic freshie that is classic in style while featuring unusual notes, JS is truly lovely. It reflects the style of its house to perfection. The only drawback is its limited performance, especially considering the price. 3.5/5.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="2252113"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=2252113#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2241227" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2241227" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hohohoez"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2005863"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2005863.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="hohohoez" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2241227ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2241227" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2005863">hohohoez</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-06">08/06/24 20:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Classic British perfumery. Opens up with juniper, cardamom, and a bit of spice (pepper). Then it quickly settles down to a lightly sweet amber and faint earthy notes (guessing it's the vetiver),  with the juniper sitting in the background. <br />
<br />
Intimate in terms of projection, but it does stay on your skin for quite some time.  If you spray in the morning, you're gonna forget it's there by the afternoon... but then you might get a little sniff later in the evening (by that time it's just a soft amber scent). <br />
<br />
Overall, very refined and understated fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="2241227"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=2241227#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2223489" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2223489" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="WitchQueen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1735970"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="WitchQueen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2223489ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2223489" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1735970">WitchQueen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-19">07/19/24 11:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>9/10 scent with 3/10 longevity. I really liked the scent. Fresh and unisex. I would never buy it because of the longevity issues on my skin.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="2223489"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=2223489#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2214332" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2214332" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Coffee_"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1637095"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1637095.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Coffee_" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2214332ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2214332" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1637095">Coffee_</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-10">07/10/24 12:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The mix of juniper berries and pepper in the mid create a very specific scent that I find to be very pleasant. I almost want to describe it as pine, even though it's not a listed note. That being said, the sweetness of the juniper berries can be a little much, but that is simply a matter of preference. I can see how the blend and the longevity would attract positive attention from almost anyone, and I believe it fits any time of year, albeit to various degrees. Personally I would love to see a similar DNA using blueberries instead of juniper, but it is good as it is.<br />
<br />
That all being said, it is still overpriced. No world should exist where this is one of Penhaligon's more expensive options.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="2214332"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=2214332#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2212752" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2212752" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fortyfree"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1631067"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1631067.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fortyfree" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2212752ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2212752" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1631067">Fortyfree</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-09">07/09/24 04:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Light, woody and a little spicy.<br />
<br />
It's light, slightly mossy and coniferous.<br />
Has some spices and woods.<br />
Amber notes are present and at times it reminded me of "Brut."<br />
It's also a little aromatic, with a faint musk and some "papery" iris like notes.<br />
As it warms off the skin it's "citrussy" and with a cool, tea aroma.<br />
(I didn't really get the juniper scent I was expecting TBH.)<br />
<br />
Would work best in the summer time, is fine for the office too.<br />
<br />
Performance was a little frustrating for me personally. The projection (off my skin) was soft and the scent quite faint overall. <br />
<br />
Try before you buy. This scent is for those with disposable income, someone who can afford the financial hit. For the average person I think there are cheaper alternatives that out perform this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="2212752"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=2212752#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2204281" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2204281" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="emgailba"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1394495"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1394495.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="emgailba" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/DS-Durga/Debaser-29736.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.29736.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Debaser"title="Debaser"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2204281ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2204281" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1394495">emgailba</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-30">06/30/24 18:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sampled because of my love for Killian's Roses on Ice, but as someone who has a lot of femme-leaning frags in her collection, there's too much vetiver here for my personal taste. However, it does seem like a crisp, fresh herbal for men. I can see why people are saying its short-lived--my sample is already fading in projection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="2204281"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=2204281#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2184352" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2184352" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tgirl1991"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1659828"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1659828.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tgirl1991" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.59836.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Favourite"title="The Favourite"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2184352ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2184352" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1659828">tgirl1991</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-10">06/10/24 18:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was actually very torn between "like" and "ok" here because I actually think this scent is great, but the longevity is APPALLING. The scent is beautiful - truly. I don't usually go for this type of fragrance but it's absolutely lovely. <br />
<br />
Unfortunately, I have NEVER had a fragrance last as short as this. It was COMPLETELY gone within 30 min, not a trace of it left. I have tried other Penhaligon's scents and haven't experienced this.<br />
<br />
I was very glad to have only gotten a sample of it, because at the price point of this perfume, this is highway robbery. This is an EDT with 30ml priced at $120 and 100ml at $235. For that price point, that longevity is absolutely unacceptable. Get yourself a dupe. Even if you like the fragrance, which I really do, I cannot recommend this in good conscience. For a half an hour, it's a waste of money - it'll be gone before you walk out the door.<br />
<br />
Scent Description: Sweet Juniper<br />
Sillage: Medium - arms length<br />
Longevity: Extremely Poor - 30 min<br />
<br />
Edit - In case you don't wanna scroll down and you just read mine, I felt extremely validated in others here. There are MANY people who talk about the terrible longevity of this fragrance, so be smart before purchasing. Here are a few quotes (were not hard to find, but saving you the scroll):<br />
"Longevity is rubbish"<br />
"Disappeared after about an hour"<br />
"lasting about 15 minutes"<br />
"Vanishes after 10 minutes"<br />
"disappeared from my skin without a trace in less than 15 minutes"</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="2184352"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=2184352#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2183933" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2183933" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ceramiclizard"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1853165"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ceramiclizard" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Snif/Golden-Ticket-80511.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.80511.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Golden Ticket"title="Golden Ticket"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2183933ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2183933" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1853165">ceramiclizard</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-10">06/10/24 11:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opening is refreshing and beautiful. Addictive. Definitely leaves you wanting more as it is gone in a few minutes. Dry down is meh. To me, not worth the price, but a lovely experience nonetheless.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="2183933"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=2183933#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2170630" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2170630" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ikerus"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1810799"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1810799.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ikerus" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/By-Kilian/Old-Fashioned-96096.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.96096.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Old Fashioned"title="Old Fashioned"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2170630ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2170630" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1810799">Ikerus</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-28">05/28/24 14:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I feel like I'm missing something, seeing that most people prefer this as a summer/spring fragrance. I could understand if the opening lasted much longer than the 20 minutes I experienced, but in reality, I find that the rest of the time this fragrance remains active is more fitting for outdoor campfires during cool winter/spring days.  The juniper lasts so long on my skin, and the warmth coming from the cardamom and cinnamon reminds me of the winter holidays. It also reminds me of a trip I made to the Texas hill country in the middle of December. The ashe juniper in the cold air while on horseback was a lovely experience, and Juniper Sling really brought me back to that feeling.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="2170630"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=2170630#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2165441" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
