4.5/5</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="2147398"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=2147398#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2140543" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2140543" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="EarlGraphite"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1983203"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1983203.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="EarlGraphite" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Portrayal-Man-54460.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.54460.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Portrayal Man"title="Portrayal Man"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2140543ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2140543" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1983203">EarlGraphite</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-29">04/29/24 19:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Delicious gin and tonic that disappeared from my skin without a trace in less than 15 minutes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="2140543"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=2140543#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2131792" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2131792" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="babe_esque"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2103924"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="babe_esque" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2131792ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2131792" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2103924">babe_esque</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-21">04/21/24 13:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of my go to fragrances for summer when I want to smell like I am on a lawn somewhere with a large G&amp;T in hand for that sense of mental escapism. I find it a refreshing fragrance that does well in the humidity of the summer in Spain. The pepper note adds a touch of masculinity to the fragrance to the freshness. I do wish Penhaligons would make this in a parfum or concentre but for an Eau de Toilette I find it doesnt do too bad - and can surprise with occasional wafts hours later. Personally though, I just would prefer it to be more full on in terms of silage, projection and longevity as I quite like being enveloped in a scent. It would save me needing to carry a vapouriser to top up when I feel like it was lagging.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="2131792"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=2131792#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2129631" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2129631" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="stringstheory"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2066812"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2066812.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="stringstheory" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Feve-Gourmande-87746.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.87746.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fve Gourmande"title="Fve Gourmande"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2129631ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2129631" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2066812">stringstheory</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-19">04/19/24 11:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>this is sort of what i was expecting from Luna, and is a bit similar to me. it's refreshing, but much lighter without the heavy woodsy notes of a wet forest floor (which to be clear, i don't hate!) and the citrus does actually come through. it plays very nicely with the spice notes. <br />
<br />
don't think it smells like floor cleaner at all, it does smell sanitized but less like a hospital and more like gin. i like wearing "cold" fragrances in cold weather so could personally see myself reaching for this regardless of the season. <br />
<br />
the longevity of Penhaligon's fragrances i've tried are all pretty weak, and this is no different. price:performance ratio is a solid "meh".</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="2129631"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=2129631#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2115281" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2115281" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Chesf"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1903937"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1903937.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Chesf" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Goldfield-Banks-Australia/Bohemian-Lime-60923.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.60923.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bohemian Lime"title="Bohemian Lime"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2115281ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2115281" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1903937">Chesf</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-05">04/05/24 10:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Like its name and visual design, a silver fling of fresh dewy plants, guised in the mountain mist. From early morning, mid noon, to the weary afternoon. <br />
Moody, slightly sweet, geological. <br />
<br />
Am a woman, somehow with my skin chemistry vetiver notes usually go rampant and enormous, a surprising unusual projection.   Sometimes it could turn into a headache if vetiver is heavy, but this one is quite pleasantly dispersed and light.  I feel sexy, calm and relaxed in it.<br />
<br />
Would work fantastically in a rainy day. <br />
<br />
7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="2115281"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=2115281#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2102153" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2102153" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="StardustHK"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/700482"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.700482.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="StardustHK" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dolce-Gabbana/Dolce-Gabbana-pour-Homme-1994-483.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.483.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dolce&Gabbana pour Homme (1994)"title="Dolce&Gabbana pour Homme (1994)"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2102153ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2102153" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/700482">StardustHK</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-23">03/23/24 18:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Fresh. Herbal. Transparent.  Pleasant dumb reach after shower.  Sure it doesn't last and it is ridiculously overpriced but it fits for that one purpose and works also on days of extreme heat and humidity.  Can be a refreshing alternative to a citrus centered fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="2102153"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=2102153#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2034253" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2034253" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DBlack47"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1564641"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1564641.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DBlack47" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Dior-Homme-Sport-2021-71326.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71326.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dior Homme Sport 2021"title="Dior Homme Sport 2021"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2034253ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2034253" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1564641">DBlack47</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-17">01/17/24 22:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Juniper scent that is feminine-leaning, is reminiscent of Gin and Tonic in a fragrance that is very weak, lasting 2-3 hours as a skin scent. This fragrance doesnt project and has very poor sillage, however, if you want to have an intimate fresh fragrance, this is pretty good. <br />
<br />
Few issues with this fragrance and definitely not my style, I can appreciate the complexity of the blend, but I wont be purchasing a bottle of this. <br />
<br />
Rating: 3.5/5<br />
Recommendation: Miss</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="2034253"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=2034253#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2030431" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2030431" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JetSnail22"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1602290"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1602290.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JetSnail22" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2030431ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2030431" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1602290">JetSnail22</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-14">01/14/24 03:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Perfect to clean your mind in the morning after some messy night. I wish it be a bit louder.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="2030431"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=2030431#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2025031" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2025031" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cookygirl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/874574"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="cookygirl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lancome/Idole-Aura-67578.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67578.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Idle Aura"title="Idle Aura"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2025031ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2025031" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/874574">cookygirl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-08">01/08/24 22:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is so Olivier Cresp.<br />
I knew I'd love it. It's Light Blue/I Love Love (that cinnamon!) with an initially very strong and punchy black pepper note.<br />
This was a no-brainer for me.<br />
Edit - Adding that I can't fathom Penhaligon's criteria for determining the gender designation of its scents. <br />
Juniper Sling is indeed truly unisex in my opinion (the pepper sways it just a tad to the masculine side) because the Light Blue DNA really can go either way and has thus inspired many scents across the masculine/feminine spectrum.<br />
However, all the other supposedly unisex scents that I've sampled from Penhaligon are either decidedly masculine: Quercus, Halfeti and Endymion Concentree, or feminine - like Luna.<br />
Now every person should of course wear whatever pleases them. It just puzzles me why the above scents were labelled unisex when their profiles fit perfectly with traditional conceptions of what makes a scent either masculine or feminine smelling. To my nose, nothing marks them as unisex at all.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="2025031"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=2025031#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2020956" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2020956" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="brainrot"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1394823"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1394823.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="brainrot" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2020956ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2020956" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1394823">brainrot</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-05">01/05/24 03:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>the green notes within this fragrance make an incredibly brief appearance and leave the spiced, warm notes behind. they dry down, at least on me, into a deeper skin scent before fading out of existence. longevity and sillage are nowhere to be seen, or smelt, and combined with the extremely high price point...I can see why others may like it, but it's a no from me</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="2020956"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=2020956#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2018132" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2018132" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="WesleySniper1st"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1560858"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1560858.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="WesleySniper1st" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Karl-Lagerfeld/Bois-d-Ambre-67805.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67805.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bois d'Ambre"title="Bois d'Ambre"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2018132ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2018132" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1560858">WesleySniper1st</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-02">01/02/24 15:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A nice surprise. I have this in a 5 bottle sample set and this came out my favourite.  A genuine gin and tonic aroma. It's light and understated so is a great choice for any semi-formal event that lasts a few hours. Because of the poor performance I have to say it is overpriced.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="2018132"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=2018132#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2017075" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2017075" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Celia0506"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1836589"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1836589.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Celia0506" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.38351.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Luna"title="Luna"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2017075ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2017075" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1836589">Celia0506</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-01">01/01/24 12:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a great perfume if you want to throw your money away. Smells like hardwood cleaner (Iso E Super), I kinda like it but it vanishes after 10 minutes. I would've loved to actually smell it without keeping my nose glued to my arm. I don't know what to think about it. I got a few whiffs of orris and orange but that's it. This is the only perfume named after something that I cannot smell. Honestly it made me question myself. Is my nose this bad? Do I know what juniper berries smell like? Do juniper berries actually exist? Do I even exist? WTF Penhaligon's. I just wanted to smell nice.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="2017075"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=2017075#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2012569" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2012569" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="CrissyCK"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1388879"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1388879.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="CrissyCK" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Le-Labo/Another-13-10131.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.10131.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Another 13"title="Another 13"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2012569ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2012569" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1388879">CrissyCK</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-27">12/27/23 18:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A fresh easy scent to wear. It smells like a light brunch drink in the spring! I have a hard time finding a fresh scent that doesnt smell generic, and this one stood out for me. The juniper is pleasing and light. Its not a blind buy, as its pretty tame and it might not have the wow factor that matches the price tag. However, it was worth it to me so I can finally have a freshie in my collection that wasnt basic.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="2012569"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=2012569#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1971069" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1971069" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="talkaboutscents"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1079076"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1079076.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="talkaboutscents" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1971069ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1971069" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1079076">talkaboutscents</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-07">11/07/23 12:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is yet another Olivier Cresp fragrance where he re-rendered his signature D&amp;G Light Blue for women accord. Iso E Super, Ambroxan, Amberketal, Virginia cedarwood oil, cinnamon and white musks. This one smells like a very naked version of Light Blue for women, further Iso E Super-boosted version (the actual accord is already based on a hefty Iso E Super anyway)...Dsquared2 fragrances are without exception comes to mind because each and every one of them on the market today are built on a canvas of Iso E Super...I very much prefer Light Blue/Intense for women or Dsquared2 Green Wood for similar accord. Versace eau Fraiche uses the same skeleton accord. Molecule 01/Escentric 01 resemblence is expected too. The list can go on, it's done successfully many times and no denying that it's an irresistible accord. But yeah, for the price point, if you are not into the bottle or the brand much, your money would spent better with near-identical value in return on other similar blends.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1971069"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1971069#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1947223" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1947223" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Frafrea3848"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1706890"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Frafrea3848" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1947223ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1947223" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75); Just smells like iso e super. molecule 01. Barely smells like anything, dissappeared after about an hour.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1947223"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1947223#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1938604" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1341923">COLOREDGIRLSHUFFLE</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-14">09/14/23 13:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So far my Penhaligon discovery set has provided all winners.  This is such an airy pleasant happy scent. It smells like clean skin freshly out of a shower, where a delightful clean citrusy green soap was used. I absolutely adore this. the projection is moderate and longevity leaves a lot to be desired, but it looks like I will go on a BBW hunt to see what a good layering shower gel and lotion I can use to extend its longevity.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1925968" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BohoLily"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1742804"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1742804.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BohoLily" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1925968ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1925968" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1925968"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1925968#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1915537" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1915537" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JayBeez"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1429579"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1429579.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JayBeez" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Terre-d-Hermes-17.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.17.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Terre d'Herms"title="Terre d'Herms"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1915537ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1915537" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1429579">JayBeez</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-30">08/30/23 13:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells pretty close to its namesake cocktail. And while the initial blast fades rather quickly and honestly is very much  a skin scent in short order, I somehow get whiffs of it up to 12 hours later. Brief and fleeting whiffs, but I can tell what I'm smelling. I have probably 60-70 fragrances in my collection, and have gotten rid of nearly as many, but none have come back for a surprise visit as consistently like this one does.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1915537"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1915537#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1911244" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1911244" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="deeshla57"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1810622"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="deeshla57" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Memo-Paris/Inverness-83482.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83482.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Inverness"title="Inverness"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1911244ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1911244" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1810622">deeshla57</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-25">08/25/23 11:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Despite this perfume lasting about 15 minutes, I love it. It does smell a little boozy but I get more fresh juniper berries, pepper, and orris. I wish I could work some magic on this juice to make it last longer. Please, some one figure this out! I am usually okay with a skin scent and don't seek out scents that last all day and linger like a cloud around me. But this doesn't even dry to a skin scent, it just disappears. My 1 ounce bottle may last a full month MAYBE. But I do love it. It is well blended and fresh. This is the most uplifting happy scent that I own.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1911244"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1911244#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1905760" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I smell something vaguely green and citrusy for a half a second before it disappears completely. Its very weird.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1905760"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1905760#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1899555" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1899555" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tomchapman95"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1364250"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1364250.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tomchapman95" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Armaf/Club-de-Nuit-Sillage-64105.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64105.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Club de Nuit Sillage"title="Club de Nuit Sillage"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1899555ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1899555" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1364250">Tomchapman95</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-11">08/11/23 08:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A masterpiece but longevity is rubbish </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1899555"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1899555#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1888000" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1888000" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tanss"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1476310"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1476310.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tanss" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1888000ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1888000" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1476310">tanss</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-27">07/27/23 03:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance reminds me of Nenuco, not exactly sure why. I couldn't find the notes for Nenuco online, but I read someone say it has petitgrain. Perhaps that could be what I'm getting? To be clear, it's a similar fragrance but, not the same.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1888000"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1888000#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1877434" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1877434" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="h149"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1210940"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1210940.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="h149" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1877434ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1877434" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1210940">h149</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-12">07/12/23 20:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I wanted an introduction to Penhaligons having never smelled any of their fragrances before. The selection looked a bit daunting so I just picked one at random for my left arm and asked the service person which one was her personal favorite to spray on my right. she chose Juniper Sling.<br />
<br />
Genuinely reminiscent of a gin tonic. Like sticking your nose in a just emptied glass and breathing in the cool vapors and the dregs of your cocktail, slushing together with partially melted ice cubes. The spiciness of the pepper and cardamom even simulates the way deeply inhaling a strong liquor feels like its burning your nose. A little too pungent for me to ever wear, but definitely interesting.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1877434"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1877434#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1866023" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1866023" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tybaltsway"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1318828"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1318828.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tybaltsway" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Juliette-Has-A-Gun/Pear-Inc-66120.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.66120.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pear Inc"title="Pear Inc"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1866023ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1866023" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1318828">tybaltsway</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-27">06/27/23 16:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So happy it's summer so I can wear this again. Opens up so fresh and citrusy, and then the aromatic, boozy spiciness. It does really smell like a gin cocktail. The drydown is very D&amp;G Light Blue-y, which makes sense because both are by Oliver Cresp.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1866023"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1866023#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1859512" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1859512" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="WeezyPipes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1764595"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1764595.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="WeezyPipes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Aventus-9828.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.9828.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aventus"title="Aventus"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1859512ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1859512" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1764595">WeezyPipes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-18">06/18/23 21:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells absolutely delicious but can't even last through a date no matter how much I apply. If they release an EDP with better performance I wouldn't hesitate to buy a bottle.<br />
<br />
Edit: Previously I had the sample collection which doesn't have atomizers, I thought I was dabbing a lot on but apparently not. I ended up buying a full bottle and on my skin the performance is actually ok with a few sprays (never loud but detectable 5+ hours). I had to come back and give some credit. I bought the bottle because it's just too perfect for Christmas time here in the Cayman Islands, I was willing to bathe in it but I'm glad I don't have to.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1859512"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1859512#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1849881" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
Clean and Sophisticated . Reminds me of MFK Gentle Fluidity Silver.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1849881"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1849881#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1830562" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Doesn't last much on my skin</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1830562"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1830562#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1822339" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1822339" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Katchke"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1595035"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1595035.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Katchke" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/Eau-Rose-Eau-De-Parfum-71661.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71661.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau Rose Eau De Parfum"title="Eau Rose Eau De Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1822339ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1822339" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1595035">Katchke</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-01">05/01/23 11:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opened VERY lemony/citrusy on my skin before drying down very clove-y and spicy. Pleasant and definitely a unisex fragrance in my mind, made me feel very fresh and clean without being soapy. Quite beautiful, but like most penhaligons fragrances, very little lasting power. Would wear for a brunch date, but thats probably about as long as the fragrance would last :(</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1822339"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1822339#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1818094" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1430522">jackie strength</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-26">04/26/23 09:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The black pepper note in the opening is very disturbing. if not it would be perfect.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1803547" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MysticalArugula"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1703303"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1703303.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MysticalArugula" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1803547ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1803547" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1703303">MysticalArugula</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-08">04/08/23 02:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Juniper orange aromatherapy It smells like  an all natural essential oil blend that you would diffuse when meditating. My problem is that for an EDT, it's so overpriced because it dissipates away from the skin in like less than an hour! However for such a blend of notes I I only smell juniper orange and SOME pepper. I would say I'm a little disappointed with Penhaligons with this fragrance because it could've been better for an EDT to last for at least 4 hours. Sillage is super intimate, as well as projection. I really wanted to love this scent, but it fell short and with such great potential. The Duke is a way better version of their juniper/gin take for a perfume- it's not strong and still refreshing. I'd say blending health grade essential oils on your skin will do a better job and than this fragrance. Not worth doing a Zodiac Trio</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1803547"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1803547#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1802777" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Real spicy, woody...<br />
Was wondering where have I smelled this before ?<br />
Finally cornered it to "Infinite Spicy" by Mercedes Benz. and both are created by Olivier Cresp. No wonder. About 80~90% similar.<br />
Spicy and unique.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1781505"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1781505#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1779063" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1779063" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Vesperexa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1486023"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1486023.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Vesperexa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/19-69/Female-Christ-62288.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62288.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Female Christ"title="Female Christ"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1779063ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1779063" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1486023">Vesperexa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-09">03/09/23 07:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is gorgeous and I love it, but the performance is so poor and it's so expensive that I don't think I'll ever buy it. It smells just like a gin &amp; tonic in the best, most elegant way. It's refreshing, it's classy and it's perfectly unisex. It's such a true juniper smell, you really feel like you're in a forest. I could see this working year-round too. Unfortunately, it's very weak! It has no sillage at all and lasts for about 2 hours. For the price, that's just not good enough, no matter how amazing it smells.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1779063"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1779063#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1766838" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
