padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1762664" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SeanKerber"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1239470"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1239470.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SeanKerber" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Halston/Halston-Z14-3697.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.3697.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Halston Z14"title="Halston Z14"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1762664ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1762664" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1239470">SeanKerber</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-17">02/17/23 15:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I went thru this bottle like taking a bath in it.  Then they discontinued it and then brought it back. Not afraid to wear this in public. So Amazingly intoxicating. They said at Penhaligons that it has real gin in it.<br />
Smells like a big sexy bottle of Tanqueray but not at all offensive. This is an attractive fragrance not a promotion one. <br />
Always feel sexy AF when wearing it. This is not for the 30-something limo nightclub goer guy. <br />
This is intellect. Charm. Classic. Manners. Class. Intelligence. Sophisticated without being pretentious or BDE.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1762664"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1762664#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1749427" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1749427" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fleurie20"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/21613"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.21613.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fleurie20" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1749427ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1749427" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/21613">Fleurie20</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-01">02/01/23 20:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I place this in the same category with Endymion. The two are the type of scents that I find more suitable for room spray than something you would spray on your body. Juniper would definitely bring a holiday vibe to a room.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1749427"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1749427#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1742339" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1742339" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="u24masonl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1291723"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1291723.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="u24masonl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1742339ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1742339" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1291723">u24masonl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-24">01/24/23 13:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This, to me, smells as though Penhaligon's Opus 1870 and D&amp;G Light Blue had a fragrance baby. Light, citrusy and summery, with the trademark Penhaligon coolness, depth and spiciness. It is indeed reminiscent of a gin and tonic - in a very good way. I just wish it lasted longer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1742339"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1742339#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1735312" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1735312" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="VictoriaJune"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1187200"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="VictoriaJune" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Estee-Lauder/Sensuous-2938.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2938.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sensuous"title="Sensuous"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1735312ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1735312" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1187200">VictoriaJune</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-16">01/16/23 04:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Juniper berry opening is very pleasant,  which quickly develops into spice with a slight cucumber tang, I wish the gin &amp; tonic vibe lasted longer!  I detect corriander but don't see it listed as a note. I agree this is a unisex fragrance, which<br />
I think probably leans slightly masculine. I can imagine a more mature/sophisticated man pulling this off well.<br />
Overall an interesting fragrance, I haven't come across anything else like this really so if you want to smell unique this could be one to consider.<br />
I have the 5ml sample &amp; would not be tempted to buy it for myself but I think Id appreciate it on someone else.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1735312"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1735312#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1728449" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1728449" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Speed of Life"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1443390"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Speed of Life" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Filippo-Sorcinelli/Unda-Maris-8-51538.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51538.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Unda Maris 8"title="Unda Maris 8"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1728449ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1728449" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1443390">Speed of Life</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-08">01/08/23 05:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A long time ago I visited Tibet and fell in love with the ubiquitous smell of the juniper incense used there. Its nice to have good memories closely tied to a fragrance and Ive been trying to find a predominately juniper fragrance so I can return to a favorite place as often as I like, if only in my mind. The juniper here, while close, has no sillage and is completely undetectable within minutes. Its a real shame how difficult this is to enjoy, at a lower price point I might have added it to my collection regardless.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1728449"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1728449#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1723664" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1723664" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="iszzieanna"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1234905"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1234905.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="iszzieanna" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1723664ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1723664" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1234905">iszzieanna</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-02">01/02/23 23:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells wonderful. Juniper and cocktails at its best. This reminds me of a French 95. With gin, simple syrup from the sugar and a sparkling/fizzy note from a citrus/champagne. This fragrance manages to have those fresher, sparkling notes, but also has the leather, cardamom and vetiver to give it a beautiful depth. There is a gourmand element to this which I love + the smell reminds me of dehydrated limes too</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1723664"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1723664#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1720129" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Lasts 1 hour or less but is a nice woodsy Christmas scent</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1699308"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1699308#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1697695" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1697695" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="pilotdc"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1587795"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1587795.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="pilotdc" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1697695ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1697695" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1587795">pilotdc</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-28">11/28/22 07:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's a great scent for as long as it lasts... which is about 40 minutes before it's barely noticeable. It would only be worth getting for me if it was about 1/10 of its retail price. Too bad. I love the gin &amp; tonic vibe. I'll have to find it in a different frag that actually lasts.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1697695"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1697695#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1686175" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1686175" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tobaksskab"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1601566"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1601566.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tobaksskab" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1686175ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1686175" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1601566">tobaksskab</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-11">11/11/22 12:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Once, a night in spring, in a bout of indignation, an ex of mine emptied their glass of gin-and-tonic on my freshly washed shirt. This is exactly how Juniper Sling smells. It is aromatic and acidic, smells kind of clean. It is a pleasant smell, but it disappears without a trace very fast, and before it dies, it's pretty much all citric acid to me. I got a 5 vial sample kit from Penhaligon's, and I must admit, I am not won. I think their fragrances are overpriced for what they are, and the 5 I got all revolve around a very similar profile of fresh, nondescript acidity. Not a fan.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1686175"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1686175#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1675488" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1675488" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Deelecto"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1471201"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1471201.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Deelecto" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Fragrance-Du-Bois/Secret-Tryst-Extrait-de-Parfum-72017.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72017.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Secret Tryst Extrait de Parfum"title="Secret Tryst Extrait de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1675488ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1675488" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1471201">Deelecto</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-27">10/27/22 11:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Aldehydic, sparkly and perfumey. A clean and happy grandpa scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1675488"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1675488#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1641773" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1641773" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Darling of Disquiet"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1552330"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1552330.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Darling of Disquiet" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Narciso-Rodriguez/Musc-Noir-Rose-For-Her-71596.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71596.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Musc Noir Rose For Her"title="Musc Noir Rose For Her"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1641773ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1641773" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1552330">Darling of Disquiet</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-09">09/09/22 18:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got this along with empressa and I have to say I originally thought that my favorite was empressa until I actually wore juniper sling fully not just as a test. I actually love the fact that it smells like gin, gin and tonic is actually my hubby's favorite cocktail and that was one of the things that peaked my interest. I am just writing this to ask because I am surprised to see no one saying that it smells similar to D&amp;G light blue. I actually ran out of my light blue close to the beginning of the summer and I just replaced it with juniper sling! Yes it is different specifically to me in that it doesn't have the longevity or sillage of light blue but it took it's place nicely and I really needed a reason to use it. Penhaligans isn't always cost effective and I'm guilty of babying my bottles lol.<br />
Really enjoy it but I truly just wanted to know if anyone else is reminded of light blue from it?<br />
Thx </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1641773"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1641773#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1632931" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1632931" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="scentine"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1210646"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1210646.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="scentine" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1632931ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1632931" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1210646">scentine</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-28">08/28/22 03:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I've had Juniper Sling in my collection for a few years now. Somehow it keeps resisting being reduced to "gin scent". The juniper is so dominant that it's an easy association to make, but it's a surprisingly complex and multifaceted fragrance. Looking at the notes now, I'm a little confused. I could have sworn the orange was originally listed as lemon and amber as elemi? I certainly don't remember the cherry either, now that I think of it.<br />
<br />
To me it has a fresh, almost cooling character. Despite the listed notes it doesn't smell sweet at all. More like a cool, moderately salty sea breeze carrying authentic juniper with a side of tart citrus and a slightly herbal aspect. This is my go to fragrance for blisteringly hot days. In heat it lingers longer and is also one of the rare few fragrances that doesn't become absolutely nauseating whether on myself or someone else.<br />
<br />
The only thing I wish was different is the longevity. It really is more of an EdC concentration honestly. I'm not sure it it would be possible to retain the lightness and freshness of the fragrance in a higher concentration, but I would sure like a version that would last longer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1632931"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1632931#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1628481" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1628481" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kpop_stan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1543675"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1543675.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="kpop_stan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1628481ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1628481" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1543675">kpop_stan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-21">08/21/22 14:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>In the same boat as DS9Dax - I'm making my way through the discovery set currently, and I'm pleasantly surprised by how much I like this. I smelled it from the bottle in store (I'd already put Luna on one wrist and Blenheim Bouquet on the other) and honestly thought it was ghastly but as I said to the sales associate, "I'll still test it on my skin before making full judgement"  and thankfully I did! <br />
<br />
This is the only alcoholic-smelling perfume I've enjoyed, ever. It smells boozy but it's equally refreshing, in both a green and citrus sort of way - reminds me of cucumber and lime simultaneously. I personally rate this as a unisex SLIGHTLY-leaning masculine fragrance, but it's definitely fresh enough for women to pull off. A very sophisticated scent that can be worn day or night imo.<br />
<br />
Definitely full bottle worthy if "alcohol" scents are your schtick!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1628481"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1628481#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1616082" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Sooo crispy and herbal and uplifting. LOVE IT</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1616082"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1616082#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1614172" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1614172" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DS9Dax"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1396246"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1396246.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DS9Dax" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Carmina-84206.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84206.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Carmina"title="Carmina"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1614172ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1614172" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1396246">DS9Dax</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-31">07/31/22 10:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I did the discovery set. Was surprised how much I liked this.  Sharp, sparkly, fresh. Lasts fairly well for an EDT.  Completely unisex.  Fits any time of year.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1614172"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1614172#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1611923" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1611923" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="emerson10"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1238550"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="emerson10" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/ALTAIA/Don-t-Cry-For-Me-32343.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.32343.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Don't Cry For Me"title="Don't Cry For Me"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1611923ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1611923" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1238550">emerson10</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-27">07/27/22 20:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Juniper berries are one of my fav fragrance notes, Olivier Cresp is one of my fave perfumers, Penhaligon's is one of my fave houses. Were my hopes high? Yes. Did it deliver? Yes. UGH I LOVE THIS so much. I am such a fan of so many fresh soft but complex juniper frags and this another LOVE &lt;3 <br />
<br />
This one has a lot of comparisons to Esc 01, Esc 02, and Angelique Sous La Pluie; 3 frags I LOVE and I like this one most (but yes there's a definite similarity if you are a fan of any of the aforementioned). I love the slight Marseille soap and gentle sweetness that comes through in this one. It's fizzy and fresh, but warm and soapy. I feel like it's Escentric 02 x Obvious Un Fleur D'Oranger.<br />
<br />
Such a great signature clean soapy scent. Apparently Harry Styles smells like incredibly luxurious soap. I wonder if he wears this?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1611923"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1611923#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1610458" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1610458" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lykopa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1492443"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1492443.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lykopa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Acqua-di-Parma/Acqua-di-Parma-Blu-Mediterraneo-Fico-di-Amalfi-1687.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1687.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Acqua di Parma Blu Mediterraneo - Fico di Amalfi"title="Acqua di Parma Blu Mediterraneo - Fico di Amalfi"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1610458ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1610458" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1492443">Lykopa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-25">07/25/22 15:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This reminded me of Murder on the Orient Express for some reason. There is a leathery freshness to it. I gave my sample to one of my best guy friends. Wonderfully masculine.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1610458"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1610458#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1600504" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1600504" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="artfulsmeller"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1158294"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="artfulsmeller" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1600504ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1600504" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1158294">artfulsmeller</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-10">07/10/22 16:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The black pepper is the dominant note to my nose, much like Blenheim Boutique. This one is just okay.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1600504"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1600504#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1598544" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1598544" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="puremugetto"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1305935"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1305935.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="puremugetto" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78574.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Valaya"title="Valaya"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1598544ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1598544" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1305935">puremugetto</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-07">07/07/22 12:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is beautiful. Really well crafted. I usually do not enjoy Penhaligons apart from a few compositions. This is like hermes voyage dipped in sugar. Still fresh but more grounded and feminine. Really a decent, uplifting summer formula!<br />
<br />
Edit: pepper is strong be warned</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1598544"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1598544#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1595799" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; You love Gin Tonic? Take it !</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1595799"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1595799#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1593846" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1593846" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Daisv"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1336475"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1336475.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Daisv" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/By-Kilian/Angels-Share-62615.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62615.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Angels' Share"title="Angels' Share"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1593846ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1593846" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1336475">Daisv</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-29">06/29/22 16:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is giving- sipping on some lemon spiked clear spirit with a Pepper Tree swaying in the wind.  <br />
 A stout crystal glass rimmed with Green Lime, housing a fresh concoction of Gin, Tonic, Giner-ale, alka seltzer, some vodka and waterdowned ice. It's zesty, and punchy. It's nice, for an occasion but a little flat... Perhaps I'd fancy my man wearing this if we had a Great Gatsby theme Party.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1593846"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1593846#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1589929" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1589929" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JupiterMoon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1354289"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1354289.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JupiterMoon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1589929ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1589929" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1354289">JupiterMoon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-23">06/23/22 07:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like a really nice shampoo. No single note really sticks out to me but it all blends together to get this nice fizzy soapy effect. I got this because I like Juniper fragrances. But the Juniper doesn't really stand out a lot from the other notes to me. It's more mixed in with the sweet notes and clean feeling. It's expensive and good quality but as I said it's more like a fancy shampoo. If I wanted a more distinct Juniper I would get something like Gentle Fluidity Silver. But this is inoffensive, cheery and nice.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1589929"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1589929#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1576562" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1576562" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Yoonbunny"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1196243"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1196243.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Yoonbunny" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Loewe/Agua-de-Loewe-Mar-de-Coral-30749.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30749.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Agua de Loewe Mar de Coral"title="Agua de Loewe Mar de Coral"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1576562ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1576562" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1196243">Yoonbunny</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-02">06/02/22 17:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I received two samples of this and WOW. I was not expecting to like this at all. I am in love.<br />
<br />
The initial spray is bright, fresh, and juicy? It's like someone opened a bottle of lemon spritzer on a hot day. It has a faint peppery smell but not at all overwhelming and complements the citric notes. <br />
<br />
When it dries down the cherry note comes out more. It's not at all like a sickly syrup cherry that most perfumes have. I find most fruit perfumes tend to smell overly artificial- almost bathroom freshener smell like but this is just so natural.<br />
<br />
A spray will last you at most an hour.  I would definitely justify buying a full bottle if only the performance was better.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1576562"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1576562#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1575874" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
