padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1571435" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Andy the Frenchy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1165781"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1165781.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Andy the Frenchy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1571435ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1571435" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1165781">Andy the Frenchy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-26">05/26/22 07:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A very nice juniper-centered fragrance (as the name implies), very airy. I loved the scent, it's modern, very 'clean feeling'. Unfortunately, I will have to confirm what others have already said before me: it has a poor performance. But taken as an 'anti-perfume', it's a masterpiece in its category!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1571435"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1571435#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1569652" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1569652" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cedrat"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1242784"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="cedrat" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nasomatto/Baraonda-40200.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40200.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Baraonda"title="Baraonda"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1569652ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1569652" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1242784">cedrat</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-23">05/23/22 11:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I smell a cade smokiness in the background. The angelica and juniper are very evident in the opening. Overall, this fragrance sits between Creed Spice and Wood, and Frederic Malle French Lover. However, this also suffers from the same weakness as French Lover: abysmal performance. I usually do not care about performance, but at the eye-popping prices this and FM frags are selling for, it would be a disappointment to have such low performance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1569652"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1569652#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1562940" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1562940" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Boo1974"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1465856"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1465856.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Boo1974" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.13266.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Juniper Sling"title="Juniper Sling"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1562940ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1562940" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1465856">Boo1974</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-13">05/13/22 05:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Such a fantastic spring summer fragrance, suitable for any gender and any age. It's really sings in the first 30 mins to an hour then slowly fades, leaving you with a much softer more rounded scent. The balance of smells are incredible. The juniper is ferocious at first buy then is rounded off with the orange and spiced up with the cardomon and warmed up with the amber. It's a scent that also lends itself well to layering, nd today I have worn it with ELDOs You or Someone Like You which is divine. I have bought the 100ml of this as it's just one of those purchases that you keep going back to when you want to feel fresh and sexy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1562940"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1562940#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1557139" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1557139" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hannahwdraws"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1241060"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1241060.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="hannahwdraws" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1557139ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1557139" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1241060">hannahwdraws</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-04">05/04/22 14:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Love it but it's gone in a flash, as many said, it's only discernable for an hour or two if you're lucky. When it is there it is super light, refreshing, zingy. It would make you stop sweating in the middle of summer if you got a strong whif of it. Oddly enough, it performed the best on a hot day when I was in my car and the air con was blasting to freezing. That was when it actually came off my skin and I could smell it really well, and it was lovely! But I'd prefer it to perform better in heat (when I'd actually want to wear it) and not the arctic conditions I'd be in to escape the heat.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1557139"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1557139#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1532354" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1532354" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="acottong"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1248416"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1248416.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="acottong" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1532354ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1532354" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1248416">acottong</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-28">03/28/22 15:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A beautiful scent before it fades to a skin scent in 30-60 minutes (I am not exaggerating). That first phase is heaven: deliciously bracing, spicy, fresh, aromatic, and a tiny bit juicy. I wore this to a yoga class and found that my body heat really brought out the sugar and amber notes in the base  vanilla elements.<br />
<br />
Unfortunately the lasting power on this is insultingly low. For all the crap they get, Jo Malone scents are much longer lasting than this. It's shocking.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1532354"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1532354#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1525320" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1525320" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="more_cake"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1465202"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="more_cake" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1525320ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1525320" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1465202">more_cake</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-17">03/17/22 17:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ugh. Got a vial of this one and I am totally in love with this scent. However, just like everyone else here, the longevity is really poor. Like, it was gone in 30 seconds. If this were longer wearing, I would definitely spend my money on this one. But for its poor longevity, I will definitely not purchase a full bottle despite how much I love this scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1525320"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1525320#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1520985" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1520985" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tista17"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1462544"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1462544.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tista17" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jo-Malone-London/Grapefruit-5584.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5584.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Grapefruit"title="Grapefruit"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1520985ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1520985" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1462544">tista17</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-11">03/11/22 08:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a unisex fragrance that is sharp and unlike any other ones out there. It does smell like the fizzy, pop of gin and tonic with the juniper in the background. I adore it. BUT, the staying power is extremely poor and I can't justify the cost for how little it lasts. Cheep splashes last longer than this one. If Penhaligon's will fix this...I'm sold. Additional note, same problem with other Penhaligon's Eau de Toilettes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1520985"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1520985#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1515249" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1515249" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="IoannaM"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1466852"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="IoannaM" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1515249ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1515249" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1466852">IoannaM</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-02">03/02/22 17:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got a Penhaligon's sample set and this one took me by complete surprise! I was not expected to love this! <br />
<br />
This smells like a winter walk in the Texas hill country, surrounded by trees and crushed juniper berries. This opens bright, fresh, woody, and citrusy. Some of the brightness and citrusy-ness fades as it dries down, though the notes are still noticeably present they take a back seat to the juniper and woody notes. I find it completely captivating and I can't stop smelling myself when I wear it. I love woody smells but find most of them too heavy or overbearing to wear as a young woman. This one is not! <br />
<br />
My only wish is for better lasting power. It definitely fades after a couple hours, but I love this fragrance enough that I plan to buy a full size anyway!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1515249"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1515249#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1504206" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1504206" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TabledThoughts"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1122143"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1122143.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TabledThoughts" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/Tempo-Eau-de-Parfum-48680.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48680.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tempo Eau de Parfum"title="Tempo Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1504206ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1504206" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1122143">TabledThoughts</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-14">02/14/22 11:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I believe what makes this special is the cinnamon midway and the sugar and cherry in the base.<br />
<br />
</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1504206"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1504206#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1500031" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1500031" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="goodboy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1423768"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1423768.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="goodboy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1500031ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1500031" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1423768">goodboy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-08">02/08/22 05:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>just bought the 5 x 10ml collection. This is Super Weak!! 30min and it's gone, and also doesnt project any at all. really i cannot really smell the notes, you must suck your hand all the way to your nose. thats all i can say. if you want something more fresh from this house. try blenheim bouquet, the lime notes is excellent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1500031"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1500031#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1497454" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1497454" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="eaudeghostie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1452964"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1452964.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="eaudeghostie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83483.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Goddess"title="Goddess"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1497454ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1497454" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1452964">eaudeghostie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-04">02/04/22 05:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I think this fragrance is...interesting?  It's dry, herbal, and sharp, which are not really descriptors that I go for in fragrance.  For reference, my signature perfume is Gucci Bloom.  I'm a floral girl to my core.  That being said, Juniper Sling is nice!  It's very alcoholic, smells like a gin and tonic from an upscale bar.  It also lasts decently long on me despite the fact my skin drinks fragrance.  On a good day where I prep my skin, I'm catching faint but pleasant whiffs after 4-5 hours.  It's gone by the 7th hour completely.  This would be good for someone into very dry, crisp, unisex scents that are short-lived and sit close to the skin.  Unfortunately, that isn't me.  I could only give this a 6/10 on the best of days.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1497454"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1497454#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1481439" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/27512">fragaholic79</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-11-04">11/04/21 00:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Juniper sling starts with an aromatic blast of juniper berries. A lot of people compare it to a gin and tonic scent. The spices do make an appearance. Mostly pepper, but its subtle. On my skin the star of the show is juniper berries from start to finish. Reminds me of Ziarat a juniper forest  we used to frequent when I was younger. <br />
For me its a nostalgic composition that is refreshing, uplifting and can be worn year round.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1439765"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1439765#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1438289" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1438289" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Suavis"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1408750"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1408750.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Suavis" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Electimuss/Puritas-61822.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.61822.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Puritas"title="Puritas"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1438289ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1438289" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1408750">Suavis</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-11-01">11/01/21 09:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I first tried a sample that is included in the popular Penhaligons scent library, I loved it immediately. Juniper berries have a very distinctive aroma, and this fragrance is full of it; refreshing, uplifting and classy. <br />
Excellent longevity for an EDT, a credit to Penhaligons!. Sillage is OK and it doesnt matter as long as I can smell it, and I dofor hours.<br />
The scent doesnt evolve after the first spray, not a problem for me though, juniper berries are the star here and I love it.<br />
I cant detect the base notes listed above, vetiver? sugar? cherry? amber?, this EDT has no sweetness at all, I would say its dry, crisp and uplifting.<br />
Now I have the 100ml bottle, hooray!.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1438289"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1438289#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1421632" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1421632" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="amatuerfraghead"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1347852"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1347852.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="amatuerfraghead" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/L-Ombre-Dans-L-Eau-Eau-de-Parfum-49099.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49099.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="LOmbre Dans LEau Eau de Parfum"title="LOmbre Dans LEau Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1421632ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1421632" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1347852">amatuerfraghead</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-03">10/03/21 17:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opens really bitter, and i mean really really bitter. Once it settles down more, you will get the 'gin and tonic' vibe others have been commenting. Regarding the performance, this is absolutely terrible, will be gone within 2-3 hours with subpar sillage. Dont waste your money on this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1421632"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1421632#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1392928" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1392928" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lemonblue"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1213949"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="lemonblue" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Moschino/Toy-2-Bubble-Gum-66098.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.66098.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Toy 2 Bubble Gum"title="Toy 2 Bubble Gum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1392928ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1392928" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1213949">lemonblue</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-08-15">08/15/21 18:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love this scent, finally found a decently priced 100ml and bought it. The only problem I'd say is that you'll need to bring a travel decant with you if you need past 3hrs of longevity.  And I really give a decent amount of sprays for this one 5 or more easily.  Scent is lovely though, fresh, slightly sweet, inoffensive, clean, slightly warm. Very unisex. Love the juniper.  Just wish it lingered in the air a bit more. Becomes a skin scent and then dissipates completely. Better to spray your clothes for more longevity. Projection is very low if at all past 1-2 hour mark.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1392928"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1392928#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1390757" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1390757" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ts4r"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1143921"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1143921.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ts4r" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Escentric-Molecules/Escentric-05-58970.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.58970.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Escentric 05"title="Escentric 05"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1390757ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1390757" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1143921">ts4r</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-08-11">08/11/21 18:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>To me, this perfume represents confidence! You don't need it to scream. It's there. Maybe you'll leave a trail, and it won't offend anyone but you'll smell so well put together. You could be a quiet guy, well dressed with this on, and I feel that it would captivate those around you.<br />
<br />
To me, it smells like light smoke with a dash of salt and sugar, it is dry, with a generous dose of vetiver (likely, haitian). <br />
<br />
It is so classy, non-offensive.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1390757"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1390757#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1374307" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It smells of the molecule iso - e (a less sweet version.) with citrus.  Its the scent of fresh pencil shavings.  Its very pleasant -unisex -  but a poor performer, gone with in an hour on my skin.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1371884"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1371884#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1371386" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; This is a pity as the scent is really unique. If you are a gin &amp; tonic lover like myself, you will definitely love this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1371386"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1371386#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1365275" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1365275" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="penguinrabbit"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1349583"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="penguinrabbit" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Clean/Fresh-Laundry-6763.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6763.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fresh Laundry"title="Fresh Laundry"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1365275ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1365275" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1349583">penguinrabbit</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-24">06/24/21 11:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sweet, fruity, slightly spicey gin. A very summery scent that doesn't rely solely on citrus like so many summer scents but sadly doesn't last on my skin.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1365275"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1365275#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1364919" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1364919" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="J350"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1201660"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="J350" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1364919ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1364919" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1201660">J350</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-23">06/23/21 17:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The epitome of a British Summer. Fresh, clean and classy and gin and tonic like. However, it doesnt last long. In order for this to maximise its potential, youll need to spray it all over you several times and even when it settles down, its subtle. Nothing wrong with it I say because I still got plenty of compliments wearing this. This is also more of a day time wear fragrance but I wouldnt bet any money wearing it on a hot and humid summer day but rather during mild sunny summer days where there is breeze and perhaps during the spring and day time during the winter and fall. <br />
<br />
Longevity and sillage is the biggest let down of this fragrance but its composition is a real winner. Its definitely not worth the 144 investment but it is something worth having. A bit of a contradiction there you see. If one plans on owning this, best get it from the outlets (Bicester, York and Portsmouth) then itll be more worth your money. <br />
<br />
Also, if one is into layering fragrances, pair it with Halfeti. One spray of Halfeti as the base and two sprays of the Juniper Sling. Youll thank me later. <br />
<br />
My overall score: 7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1364919"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1364919#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1346927" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1339884" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MarianneT"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1336511"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="MarianneT" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1339884ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1339884" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78); The straightforward, piercing juniper berry quickly mingles with the deeper scent and gradually blends with the skin. In the end, it leaves a definite sweetness and clean feeling on the skin. I love this scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1339884"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1339884#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1337941" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Do not dislike but not very enjoyable. Juniper, pink pepper and a very high pitched aldehyde buzzing on top. Not much to ground it. Faint sweetness in middle. Barely detectable after one hour. Do not understand the high price for a fairly simple scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1324814"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1324814#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1314236" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1254643">tonkatsu335</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-03-26">03/26/21 04:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>When I smelled it directly where I put it on, I was surprised by the overly bitter scent.<br />
<br />
I thought I wouldn't like it, but when I fanned it and smelled it, it really did smell like Gin tonic, just like they say!<br />
<br />
I don't know if I like it or not, but I think it is a unique and mysterious scent that is both refreshing and bittersweet.<br />
<br />
The scent disappears quickly, so the cost performance seems to be poor.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1314236"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1314236#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1298741" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1304851">botany28</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-02-25">02/25/21 16:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Positive impressions of Penhaligon's, this being my first to sample from the brand. It's fresh, cool, and spicy, and smells really natural. I definitely get the juniper, black pepper, and the orange. Unfortunately it is so incredibly fleeting and light (literally a couple of minutes and it's hardly perceptible) that I wouldn't ever consider purchasing... and that's coming from someone who can tolerate low longevity!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; -Opens with a blast of gin, that's somehow well blended with florals.<br />
-If you've tried Nordes gin, you can probably consider yourself to have experienced downing this. <br />
-Not fbw. (-)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1292460"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1292460#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1283931" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1283931" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tulpan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1110821"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tulpan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rihanna/Reb-l-Fleur-10554.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.10554.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Reb'l Fleur"title="Reb'l Fleur"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1283931ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1283931" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1110821">Tulpan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-01-29">01/29/21 15:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Realistic gin and tonic at first spray, hitting with the juniper berries and aromatic freshness. Yet it is so much more than a simple G&amp;T, it soon becomes warmer and I can feel the leather, adding just the right amount of warmth. I can also detect a light aniseed note and I think it would be very suitable for a hot weather, when other perfumes are too much. Eventually it fades into a light caramel scent that stays close to the skin. As already mentioned projection/longevity leaves you wanting more, yet somehow I wouldn't mind reapplying throughout the day to get the hit of the juniper berries that is so fleeting.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1283931"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1283931#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1275685" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1275685" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ginandrice"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1246357"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1246357.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ginandrice" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Aesop/Hwyl-46895.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46895.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hwyl"title="Hwyl"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1275685ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1275685" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1246357">ginandrice</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-01-14">01/14/21 01:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opens with a crisp, tangy scent that makes me think of mixing fresh herbs and spices with a bit of licorice root. <br />
<br />
I love the elegant neutrality of Juniper Sling before the drydown. It has a faint touch of sweetness to it, and a faint touch of bitterness, but is overall just very tangy and herbal. I picture a G&amp;T drinker sipping away contemplatively: androgynous, direct, elegant. (Donna Tart. I'm picturing Donna Tartt.)<br />
<br />
Sadly, that incisive opening quickly dwindles down to a faint, dry, wood-and-leather skin scent. In short: the first twenty minutes are marvelous. The next twenty are disappointing. And then its time to reapply.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1275685"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1275685#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1252836" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1252836" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MaquiLab"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1254834"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1254834.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MaquiLab" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1252836ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1252836" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1254834">MaquiLab</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-11-25">11/25/20 05:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opens up with fresh juniper, which then mellows with the help of pepper and cardamom (my preferred gin spices!), and gently subsides as a powdery veil. I wouldn't say it's the perfect concoction as I love a bit of sweetness which I couldn't find here despite the cherry and sugar in the notes. The other downside is that it's terribly short-lived. It's not a full bottle, it's a welcome drink. For the full experience - just mix your own gin and tonic.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1252836"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1252836#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1252614" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; If they would have toned down the sweetness, this would have been a fantastic buy and an excellent alternative to Jean Claude Ellena's enigmatic creation.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex;
