padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1202425">dabearjew82</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-11-18">11/18/20 16:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's a edt so don't expect beast mode or lasting power. But it's nice, not going to turn anyone off. I like the juniper lemony smell a lot. But performance turns me off. The juniper sling body soap mixed with this def turns up the lasting power. I actually prefer the gel to the edt. Good for what it is, an after shower freshy</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1250246"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1250246#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1236234" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1236234" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jamcd"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1257368"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1257368.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jamcd" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1236234ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1236234" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1257368">jamcd</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-10-13">10/13/20 11:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Lovely sharp opening - gin, juniper, pepper, alcohol - and all well blended. I think the juniper/gin note could stand to let the other notes have a chance at the limelight, but it's not the end of the world. Develops into a warm, faintly spicy, caramel-y scent that is at once delicious and refined. Could equally see myself wearing this in an office as well as at a classy dinner party. Yum.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1236234"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1236234#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1224100" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1224100" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="scensitive"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1226445"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1226445.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="scensitive" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Roja-Dove/Harrods-Aoud-56709.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.56709.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Harrods Aoud"title="Harrods Aoud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1224100ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1224100" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1226445">scensitive</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-09-14">09/14/20 05:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A faint effort at global pub crawl commences as you saunter down the way.<br />
<br />
Hard water keeps the lemon zest exceptionally pronounced against a low fog of dusky evergreens.<br />
<br />
It is only after the loud o/o proof opening when the sweet life begins:  a fresh cherry tattoo rationalized to the morgue by a spiked sugar cube.<br />
<br />
Upon waking in the morn, you reckon it was not the alcohol that caused you to be put in a sling by your tattooist, rather than conclude a fling, whose name was actually Hammer and not Amor.  <br />
<br />
To top it off, your mother did not get the homage deserved and the Shirley Temple hangover remedy isnt quite numbing the agony of reading new ink in the mirror, I [cherry emoji] HOMS.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1224100"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1224100#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1199467" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1199467" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BethW"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1242842"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="BethW" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Escentric-Molecules/Escentric-05-58970.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.58970.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Escentric 05"title="Escentric 05"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1199467ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1199467" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1242842">BethW</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-07-14">07/14/20 06:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Beautiful, fresh, spiky juniper. Initial spray is invigorating and refreshing on a hot day. Lasting power is abysmal, which is a real disappointment. To wear it out for a day requires liberal and frequent re-application. Will use as a short term pick-me-up throughout summer while stuck indoors but won't repurchase.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1199467"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1199467#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1192457" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1192457" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="katsong"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/443791"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.443791.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="katsong" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Dior-Homme-Intense-2011-13016.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.13016.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dior Homme Intense 2011"title="Dior Homme Intense 2011"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1192457ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1192457" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75); tonic drink. <br />
<br />
The dry down smells like the common musks/base in the Jardin sur la Nil series by Hermes!  Lovely!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1192457"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1192457#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1163294" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1163294" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="NY Frag Snob 22"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1230898"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1230898.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="NY Frag Snob 22" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1163294ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1163294" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1230898">NY Frag Snob 22</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-04-12">04/12/20 17:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So if you have ever owner or smelled mugler ice men this is pretty much the same scent except not as sharp and less projection and staying power to be honest i love this scent and its perfect for summer late spring on hot days its a refreshing smell like a nice mint julip or mojito in july lol but like i always say this is MY OPINION and the way it works with MY chemistry so it may be a total diffrent experience for you so get a decant sample or go to a store and sample it on YOUR SKIN not paper because your skin and clothes ate not made of paper so it will smell diffrent u get what i mean lol i wouldnt blind buy this to be honest because u might hate it but i did because i read it smelled like ice men and i loved ice men for summer so i knew what i was kinda getting so but it wouldnt offend anyone and is fresh so kinda safe to wear anywhere so ...but again opinions are like as****** EVERYONE HAS ONE so dont matter what i say or the next person or the person after that said it all matters what YOU think so be smart and get a sample or decant or sample at the store if its possible and make sure u dont waste 200$ or more on a bottle because blind buying at this price point is pretty stupid unless ur rich and have money to burn then who cares but im sure most of us here are not in that position unfortunately so be smart and try it out first lol</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1163294"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1163294#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1099626" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1099626" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jerry Can"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/785126"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.785126.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jerry Can" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1099626ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1099626" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/785126">Jerry Can</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-09-21">09/21/19 04:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like gin  which you'd sort of expect with such a dominant juniper opening. I definitely get the G&amp;T comparison though it isn't 'Gordons &amp; Schweppes'. Quite green and airy in a fresh and breezy sort of way, and initially at least, ever so slightly astringent.<br />
<br />
None of this lasts more than a couple of minutes because there is an immediate transformation. And this is the point where I struggle. Orris, pepper, cardamom (none of them especially striking) are part of an imprecise spicy sweetness tinged with an incredibly dilute juniper. Try as I have, I just don't pick-up on any cherry, vetiver and barely even the amber. All I'm getting is an indeterminate sweetness with a vague residual spice and an even more marginal citrus.<br />
<br />
Not sure, but I think there is something in the dry down that reminds me of Prada Infusion d'Iris' strangely sterile, baby-powder, 'nappy bag' smell.<br />
<br />
To my dismay, the bottle I've purchased seems unlike the sample I tested in the Penhaligon shop. The disappointment is indescribable since I was utterly taken by the juniper opening (one of my favourite notes). The projection is modesty itself (whilst there is any to talk of). The longevity is criminally bad: a skin scent within a couple of minutes. What happened?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1099626"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1099626#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1092838" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1092838" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Alanitoo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/230249"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.230249.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Alanitoo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1092838ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1092838" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/230249">Alanitoo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-08-30">08/30/19 11:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The opening smells like alcohol, and the dry down is almost identical to Light blue for women. and the performance is terrible, especially for that price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1092838"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1092838#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1085775" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1085775" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="chezchez2011"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/879868"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.879868.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="chezchez2011" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1085775ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1085775" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/879868">chezchez2011</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-08-08">08/08/19 06:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is one of my daily fragrances, I love it and I get compliments from men and women daily. I have to disagree with what people are saying about the performance and longevity of this fragrance. On my skin and clothes it lasts all day, yes it does become lighter but I can still smell it towards the end of the day when I sprayed it in the morning, and other people can still smell it on me also. This is a special fragrance</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1085775"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1085775#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1061455" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1061455" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="addiehominem"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1078812"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1078812.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="addiehominem" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tauer-Perfumes/02-L-Air-du-Desert-Marocain-4573.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4573.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="02 L'Air du Desert Marocain"title="02 L'Air du Desert Marocain"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1061455ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1061455" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1078812">addiehominem</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-05-17">05/17/19 13:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of those rare fragrances that morphs into something else entirely as it dries down. It starts just as you think it would, bright, boozy, and clean. The top notes are bit too on-the-nose with the alcohol for my taste (hey! it's supposed to be gin), but they burn off quick. The cherry and wood notes are prominent on my skin once it dries down, with maybe a touch of juniper leftover from the start. It smells great, really, like a fancy aromatic gin cocktail spiked with grenadine. My main criticism is that it's too soft on the sillage for how much it goes for; they really ought to put out an EDP version.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1061455"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1061455#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1058552" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1058552" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="pois"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1163010"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="pois" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1058552ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1058552" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1163010">pois</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-05-09">05/09/19 01:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love juniper notes. It can be gin like but I love how bracing and aromatic it smells, like fresh air This has Juniper on its name and it does not skimp on it, a very strong topnote. It is a bit fleeting, but that is the nature of some notes anyway. Afterwards lots of interesting notes to an unusualy fresh drydown. There is an ambroxan note on the middle of it it, unfortunately for me, but it is not too obnoxious, I can live with it. And I really love the drydown, it is aromatic and cool and fresh and slightly powdery - I can get the cardamom, the orris and the leather. I am going to love wearing this in really hot days.  <br />
<br />
This reminds me a lot of Angliques sous La Pluie - AslP is more original and has an amazing life-like rainy springtime garden impression. But AslP has a "cedar" note which I do not particularly like to wear and find cloying and so I prefer Juniper Sling for my own use even if AslP is undoubtedly a more remarkable scent.<br />
<br />
Incidentally, it came in a particularly beautiful,  heavy, textured box, perhaps the most beautiful box I ever got . The turquoise and silver art-deco box with black trim seems perfectly in tune with the scent itself. The bottle itself feels a bit cheap, surprisingly so for the price of this - seams in the glass at the sides, the metal plaque seems flimsy, a sticker at the bottom,</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1058552"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1058552#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1043299" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1043299" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tayyabforyouth"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1124219"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1124219.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tayyabforyouth" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Acqua-di-Parma/Colonia-Club-31424.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31424.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Colonia Club"title="Colonia Club"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1043299ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1043299" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1124219">tayyabforyouth</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-03-21">03/21/19 12:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a very pleasant green mix of juniper berries and vetiver, and smells literally like a gin cocktail. It's nice but not amazing (unless you love the gin note). Projection and longevity are both moderate.<br />
<br />
4/5</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1043299"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1043299#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1019334" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1019334" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Pempipot"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1178494"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1178494.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Pempipot" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Atelier-Cologne/Cafe-Tuberosa-45964.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.45964.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Caf Tuberosa"title="Caf Tuberosa"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1019334ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1019334" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1178494">Pempipot</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-01-11">01/11/19 10:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very pleasant and highly original. Fresh, but with warm undertones. An interesting twist on the classic cologne, with juniper instead of the ever present lemon (which I smell rather faintly). Problem is... it disappear in minutes. Lasting power is really super duper low! A pity, really.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1019334"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1019334#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1016595" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1016595" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="brumbarche"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1001822"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1001822.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="brumbarche" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1016595ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1016595" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1001822">brumbarche</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-01-04">01/04/19 03:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love the drydown as much as I love the opening. I couldn't buy it without having to wait shipping etc ... so I heavily sprayed with a sample my left wrist and lightly my right wrist to ensure that whatever I smell in my quest to find smth similar will be properly compared. Well, there' was nothing out there as heavenly, that has the juniper in it and the freshness we find here. However ... few options compared as closely as possible to the drydown phase of juniper sling - <br />
- bvlgari the blanc<br />
- bois d'argent<br />
- adios pampamia woman<br />
- van arpels bois d'iris <br />
Fist one felt to be more sheer and musky and great for the warm seasons, the last one is the most powdery - wonderful all year round (the iris ...).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1016595"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1016595#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1003633" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; +++</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="1003633"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=1003633#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent998676" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc998676" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Forever Neil"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1155359"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1155359.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Forever Neil" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Arrogance/Arrogance-Pour-Homme-6490.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6490.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Arrogance Pour Homme"title="Arrogance Pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma998676ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd998676" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1155359">Forever Neil</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-11-07">11/07/18 21:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>WHOA! This one is excellent, and at a fair price! I am highly impressed by the sample I was given at the mall. It's a very tender citrus scent infused with juniper that is better than most of the samples I've tried. <br />
<br />
Con: Projection may be a deal breaker for some.<br />
Pro: it's a very pleasant scent for those that usually don't wear or like fragrances. It's one of the better unisex fragrances out there.<br />
Final verdict: ordered<br />
<br />
Video review here if interested. youtu.be/6GaxNKh5h_o</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="998676"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=998676#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent997070" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It as a strong citrus smell. Might sound weird, but it reminds me of the smell of a Sunkist soda and a bit like the grease fighting soap Gojo. After about 2 hours the orange citrus smell gives way to the other notes. Not bad overall, but I'm not sure when I would wear it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="997070"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=997070#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent986585" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Opening is great but dies down rather quickly.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="973449"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=973449#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent969687" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/242539">franciscrawford</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-08-07">08/07/18 22:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This opens extremely fresh and vibrant juniper, but the drydown is disappointing with a cheap aquatic note. The opening is great, pity the rest of the scent does not match it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="969687"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=969687#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent921384" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc921384" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="leogusso"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/964860"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="leogusso" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma921384ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd921384" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/964860">leogusso</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-03-13">03/13/18 01:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>What a pleasant discovery! At the beginning it really smells like Gin Tonic, not a joke. It seems to smell a great quality Gin (gin tonic lovers will understand me). After the first 10 minutes, it turns into a fresh but very modern, elegant and refined fragrance. Juniper, Ambroxan and Vetiver are definitely the predominant notes, perceptible even after hours. To me, it remembers a lot Escentric 02 by Escentric Molecules. You absolutely have to try it!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="921384"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=921384#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent901858" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc901858" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Titan_Rain"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1097022"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1097022.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Titan_Rain" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ephemera-by-Unsound/Bass-30678.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30678.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bass"title="Bass"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma901858ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd901858" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1097022">Titan_Rain</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-01-18">01/18/18 05:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Only reminded me of a gin tonic for the first 10 minutes of its life on my skin. It then turned into a sour, fresh, slightly acidic and astringent tangerine/citrusy skin scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="901858"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=901858#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent891938" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1052526">GsT</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-12-20">12/20/17 09:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Beautiful fresh opening, fizzes with effervescence and then...disappears completely after 30 minutes, if not less! <br />
<br />
While it lasted it reminded me of Voyage d'Hermes, just fresher and softer somehow. Wish it came in an EDP, maybe that would give it some staying power and I'd make a commitment to purchase.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="891938"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=891938#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent883847" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1002924">Christie-Jack</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-09-25">09/25/17 08:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a truly strange but wonderful fragrance.  While it is a clean  fragrance it is far from soapy.  It radiates in waves with each movement, and lingers for hours.<br />
It's unique in as far as you want to smell it over and over again but always leaves you wanting more. <br />
<br />
It's different and will go well in my collection. <br />
<br />
I'm always striving for the perfume utopia, that special one that others can't guess the name of but all want to know it.<br />
<br />
Of course, I won't tell them what it is... for then it will be too popular and my search will again start over!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="864510"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=864510#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent845498" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
