padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1005584">zesty_calco</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-07-27">07/27/17 11:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Lots of juniper in the opening. I get the vetiver and citrus. Maybe a little pepper, sweetness, cherry and amber. I do smell the gin and tonic but it isn't boozy. Clean and fresh; reminds me of a bit of Voyage d'Hermes. <br />
<br />
Sillage and projection are light. Only lasts about four hours before becoming very soft. No one will be able to smell this. A unisex, summery fragrance that any age can wear. Nice high quality, nautral smelling ingredients. Not sure if it's worth the price though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="845498"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=845498#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent843561" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc843561" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="beckhen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/921245"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="beckhen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/FZOTIC/Pantoum-69086.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.69086.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pantoum"title="Pantoum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma843561ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd843561" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/921245">beckhen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-07-21">07/21/17 15:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>When I am on a very specific perfume quest, I'm most often disappointed. In this case, I was searching for a true gin and tonic scent. Fresh, sharp, herbal. I fell in love with this one sprayed on a blotter. And on my skin, I am still smitten by the heavy juniper opening.<br />
<br />
But then this fragrance veers off into a completely different cocktail. Not exactly false advertising, because it's all there in the notes pyramid. There's an intense freshly cracked pepper phase, and then cherry and brown sugar notes make themselves known over a gentle musk. Okay, but not the droid I'm looking for.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="843561"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=843561#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent836497" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc836497" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="esteban747"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/442802"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.442802.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="esteban747" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/So-Blue-30496.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30496.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="So Blue"title="So Blue"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma836497ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd836497" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/442802">esteban747</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-06-28">06/28/17 16:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was having in mind a typical juniper scent.<br />
But this is better. Much better.<br />
It smells like a cologne, clean with just a couple of ingredients. But then it keeps unraveling, showing different notes that start to combine, blend and melt continuously.<br />
A soft dry woody composition. Sublime spiciness and delicate citrus.<br />
It's phenomenal. A real class act.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="836497"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=836497#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent834807" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc834807" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="vinyl_junky"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1054736"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="vinyl_junky" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Geo-F-Trumper/GFT-5004.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5004.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="GFT"title="GFT"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma834807ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd834807" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1054736">vinyl_junky</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-06-22">06/22/17 21:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I received a sample of this with my last purchase at Penhaligon's, and I just might invest in a whole bottle!<br />
<br />
The open is absolutely divine, with juniper front-and-centre. Lots of reviews have commented on how similar this smells to gin, and I concur. However, it's not overwhelming, like you dunked yourself in a vat of gin. Instead, it's a refreshing cocktail of juniper, vetiver and pepper, which sustain through the drydown. There's a hint of citrus mixed in there, which gives it some "fizz". <br />
<br />
Longevity, however, is the only downside. I get around 4 hours out of this, and it's  skin scent on me. Given the price, you can't really reapply that often. However, it's still worth a buy in my books.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="834807"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=834807#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent834110" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc834110" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="OneBlueSummer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/899730"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.899730.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="OneBlueSummer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Andree-Putman/Tan-d-Epices-33889.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.33889.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tan d'Epices"title="Tan d'Epices"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma834110ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd834110" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/899730">OneBlueSummer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-06-20">06/20/17 16:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>potential... and its super lame and super tame. Make an extreme version then we will talk! and Man up that juniper make it like a shot to the face!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="834110"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=834110#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent821735" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc821735" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="fishwife"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1033613"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1033613.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="fishwife" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Molton-Brown/Fiery-Pink-Pepper-Eau-de-Parfum-57718.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.57718.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fiery Pink Pepper Eau de Parfum"title="Fiery Pink Pepper Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma821735ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd821735" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1033613">fishwife</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-05-11">05/11/17 08:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Juniper Sling is a lovely unisex fresh fragrance of juniper berries and spices...it does remind me of a gin cocktail...this is a really well done fragrance that is sure to be one of Penhaligion's classics...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="821735"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=821735#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent811790" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc811790" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="F2097"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1009212"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="F2097" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma811790ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd811790" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1009212">F2097</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-04-12">04/12/17 03:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I've held off on writing a review of this before. Overall I think Juniper Sling is good but it is not without limitations.<br />
<br />
It is another one of those Penhaligons scents that seems over refined to the point that any uniqueness or even feeling is toned right down. It doesn't help that Juniper scents tend to have poor projection. Although this lasts a good few hours on the skin you won't smell it unless you try.<br />
<br />
Over on the plus side this is quite an enjoyable fragrance. It feels professional and will give you confidence when you get a hint of it from your collar.<br />
<br />
I like how metallic it starts off and I find it quite an authentic Juniper. It can go quite like blackcurrant in the middle notes. Like most Penhaligons scents this is well made.<br />
<br />
The shower gel was ok but I wouldn't buy it again. I like that they have this in a smaller bottle because I don't think I would use it enough or want to have it for as long as a large bottle would last.<br />
<br />
This is quite similar to Esprit Du Roi, which I think is a little more exciting and versatile but perhaps less universally appealing. <br />
<br />
Good for confidence, for formal or professional occasions. Quite suitable for work. Falls down a bit if wearing for fun.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="811790"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=811790#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent800456" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc800456" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mas777"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/336000"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.336000.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mas777" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lancome/O-de-Lancome-187.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.187.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt=" de Lancme"title=" de Lancme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma800456ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd800456" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/336000">Mas777</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-03-09">03/09/17 11:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's amazing! When I tested I felt in a northern forest..it's fresh, magical, joyful, smart. <br />
It could brighten up a very gloomy day :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="800456"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=800456#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent797236" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc797236" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Stinow"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/121366"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.121366.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Stinow" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/Golden-Dallah-51728.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51728.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Golden Dallah"title="Golden Dallah"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma797236ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd797236" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/121366">Stinow</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-02-28">02/28/17 05:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>What a great smell this perfume has.<br />
<br />
To me it starts off by opening the package and being reminded of the initials berry flavors this fragrance brings.<br />
<br />
When I put it on (I usally use quite a lot of this fragrance because the longevity is short, to say the least), it starts of with a healthy dose of leather, dark berries and union. <br />
<br />
This fragrance reminds me of the 80's. Classic popstars from the eighties like Prince. Not in a dull, but more in an intriguing way. Like he lures me in to know more about this smell.<br />
<br />
It is a smell of self confidence, but is also very interesting and slightly masculine.<br />
<br />
Apart from the awful longevity.. this one is just AMAZING! :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="797236"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=797236#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent790588" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc790588" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="luxbuyer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1005254"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1005254.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="luxbuyer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma790588ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd790588" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); (   (   </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="790588"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=790588#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent765372" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc765372" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bugsyiii"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/961762"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.961762.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="bugsyiii" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Infusion-d-Homme-3794.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.3794.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Infusion d'Homme"title="Infusion d'Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma765372ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd765372" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/961762">bugsyiii</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-11-28">11/28/16 17:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As my wife and I explored The Art of Shaving store, we couldn't help but give a few of the Penhaligon fragrances a smell!<br />
<br />
So out of the few, Juniper Sling and Opus 1870 were those that really peeked our (my) interest-Juniper Sling is a nice fragrance; fresh, a bit citrusy but with a woody foundation. In the opening there is the Black Pepper and Vetiver that I get followed by the Ambrox that gives this a good fresh yet sharp woodsy finish. Later the Orris Wood comes through along with the Juniper Berry that gives this, what I describe as, an aromatic allure that is really nice.<br />
<br />
After spraying some on my wrist I couldn't figure out the familiarity....I sniffed and smelled but still nothing. I couldn't put my finger on it. As the dry down became more prominent, I figured it out---this reminded me of 2 other fragrances 1) D&amp;G Light Blue and 2) Versace Man Eau Fraiche. Don't get me wrong these fragrances have their unique qualities, however, there are some very distinct characteristics that I pick up. <br />
<br />
Overall, a nice fragrance. I would give this a neutral rating because you can acquire Versace Man Eau Fraiche or D&amp;G Light Blue for less and get a similar vibe.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="765372"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=765372#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent749337" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc749337" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="smellavision"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/772238"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.772238.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="smellavision" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rabanne/Paco-Rabanne-Pour-Homme-526.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.526.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Paco Rabanne Pour Homme"title="Paco Rabanne Pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma749337ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd749337" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/772238">smellavision</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-10-05">10/05/16 11:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This scent is just so incredible to me for the first 15-30 minutes. A fantastic, creamy introduction of the fresh juniper, leather, pepper, nutmeg and some cardamom. <br />
Unfortunately, it lasts shortly, turning quickly into a skin scent and utterly vanishing within 3 hours on my skin. The heart is almost non-existant and the drydown only shortlived.<br />
<br />
I would seriously suggest for Penhaligons to make an Extreme or EdP version of this, because at almost  100 per bottle, this is overcharging for a lovely Eau Fraiche. Dammit!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="749337"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=749337#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent742530" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc742530" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Calvini"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/518579"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.518579.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Calvini" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma742530ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd742530" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/518579">Calvini</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-09-15">09/15/16 00:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm not really a drinker, so I'm not very open to trying new alcohol either, but while making a friend gin &amp; tonic one day, I noticed how wonderfully aromatic it smells!<br />
"Oh yeah it's the juniper" he said. Ever since then it's been one of my favorite alcoholic drink; it's like drinking a cologne!<br />
One of these days I'll do a serious search, but for now, let's talk about this one: The opening is AMAZING and true to life, but quickly turns into a wispy "frankincense" fragrance  (trust me even though it's not a listed note, it's comparable to the pure essential oil); it's still good but leaves me wanting more.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="742530"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=742530#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent720553" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc705775" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="artemiss"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/746368"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.746368.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="artemiss" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Imaginary-Authors/Dipped-in-Chocolate-99066.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.99066.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dipped in Chocolate"title="Dipped in Chocolate"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma705775ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd705775" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/746368">artemiss</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-05-15">05/15/16 07:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am so surprised to see so many people say this is a spring or summer scent to them..to me this is a winter scent all the way. <br />
While I get cocktail- it's very much juniper berries, moss and anise with an almost effervescent twist from the citrus. It's crisp and clean, simple lines against newly fallen snow.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="705775"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=705775#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent696979" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/771398">miracleborgtech</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-04-15">04/15/16 20:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>From the bracing juniper to the prickly pepper, Juniper Sling caught my attention immediately.  This is the first perfume I've smelled that is almost antiseptic - it is cool, clean, carbonated!  Quite exhilarating, every time I sniffed I caught a little different side to this refreshing tonic! Unfortunately the sillage and longevity are both under achievers, so I had to souse myself.  Large spray bottle forecast!<br />
<br />
Edit - Accidentally spilled part of a mini and the scent does not do as well when liberally applied.  Less is more with this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="696979"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=696979#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent681978" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc681978" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ironman322"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/852855"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ironman322" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Burberry/Touch-for-Men-815.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.815.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Touch for Men"title="Touch for Men"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma681978ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd681978" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/852855">ironman322</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-02-27">02/27/16 15:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells like mugler Cologne</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="681978"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=681978#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent678764" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc678764" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="froogle_jimmy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/947753"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.947753.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="froogle_jimmy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/The-Art-Of-Shaving/Green-Lavender-Cologne-Intense-42174.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.42174.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Green Lavender Cologne Intense"title="Green Lavender Cologne Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma678764ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd678764" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/947753">froogle_jimmy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-02-18">02/18/16 07:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The opening of this fragrance is fantastic....possibly my favorite 45minute opening of any fragrance. the scent of gin and tonic is playful and enticing and makes me just want to smell this all day.<br />
<br />
However once this cologne has dried down it becomes a lack lustre mess. just light florals and some woods with nothing else. An empty shell of what could have been a fantastic fragrance. Not only that it is completely gone by 4 hours....if it even makes it that long.<br />
<br />
So sad. It could have been amazing, but alas it is a pass for me.<br />
<br />
Opening 10/10<br />
Longevity 3/10<br />
overall performance 3/10<br />
<br />
5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="678764"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=678764#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent678402" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc678402" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Go4broke"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/283374"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.283374.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Go4broke" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sean-John/Unforgivable-2209.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2209.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Unforgivable"title="Unforgivable"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma678402ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd678402" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/283374">Go4broke</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-02-17">02/17/16 10:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Update:<br />
I've just bought my second bottle of Juniper Sling, my first was bought in May 2013, and it would seem that there may have been some reformulation. The longevity of the juice I've just bought seems to be a lot better, which would mean Penhaligon's are listening to the consumers. This is obviously a good thing because just 3 squirts of this now lasts me genuinely just under 8 hours and I very much doubt my skin chemistry has changed. I love this, I always have and compliments surround me because of it. A summertime gem just became even more wearable........</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="678402"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=678402#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent668161" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc668161" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="numcks"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/82392"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.82392.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="numcks" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Etat-Libre-d-Orange/Fat-Electrician-Semi-Modern-Vetiver-7139.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.7139.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fat Electrician Semi-Modern Vetiver"title="Fat Electrician Semi-Modern Vetiver"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma668161ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd668161" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/82392">numcks</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-01-17">01/17/16 10:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Another Oliver Cresp work that leaves me disappointed. Jungle pour homme by Kenzo is another creation as is Armand Bosi  Homme. All share the same thin, pale, construction that leaves you straining to detect anything and wanting more. This is the worst of the three - barely there - homeopathic perfumery. Either Oliver has a bloodhound's sense of smell, or he is too reticent and apologetic. What little I can pick up is generally okay, especially early on when there is some gin-fizziness. A pale touch of anise is also nice, but a boring woody amber base smells generic, not unlike pure iso E (think Escentric Molecules 01). A yawn.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="668161"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=668161#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent660783" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc660783" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="adamjohn"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/979976"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.979976.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="adamjohn" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma660783ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd660783" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/979976">adamjohn</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2015-12-26">12/26/15 12:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is my first penhaligons purchase and i like it. Its reminds me a little of d&amp;g light blue for women longeverty isnt great but would recomend it</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="660783"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=660783#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent658206" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc658206" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Hoxx"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/26448"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.26448.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Hoxx" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Matiere-Premiere/Parisian-Musc-59063.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.59063.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Parisian Musc"title="Parisian Musc"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma658206ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd658206" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/26448">Hoxx</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2015-12-17">12/17/15 22:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>For what it's worth, I had a juniper tree in my backyard for, like, fifteen years so I'm very familiar with its smell. That being said, Juniper Sling resembles a plant scent more than a gin scent, IMO. It's not boozy, at all. It's green, aromatic, slightly sour and a bit spicy. Notes of juniper, spices and other herbal stuff mesh so well that I was in awe and I couldn't stop sniffing my wrist. A bit later it gets a touch sweeter - I have no idea where that comes from - but still fresh in an aromatic way, and later it introduces vetiver as well. It still remained beautiful, though.<br />
<br />
Then the drydown starts, after two or three hours tops, and it lasts for a fine amount of time, but it's a sort of cheap woody accord, very often used in perfumery of today(maybe Iso E Super with an addition of something of less interest). So, you can't say the overall longevity of JS leaves something to be desired, but the 'good parts' evaporate in little time. Its projection is personal, but I'd say that's to be expected from the note list(and it's a common thing for Penhaligon's, from my experience).<br />
<br />
Juniper Sling is very versatile in terms of, well, everything. It lacks a bit of oomph and warmth to be worn in wintertime but, aside from that, it knows no boundaries, season-wise, style-wise or gender-wise(although I think men will prefer it). <br />
<br />
All in all, Penhaligon's did a fine job with this one, but a better longevity or a more inspiring drydown could've made this a masterpiece. It's still good, make no mistake, but it could've been fantastic...<br />
<br />
8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="658206"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=658206#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent634797" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; They sell maybe 20 or 30 thousand bottles. It's a very nice perfume, as good as Light Blue. If a big brand had bought it I'm sure it would have been a huge success.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="634797"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=634797#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent626778" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="626778"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=626778#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent624691" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; tonic. But as people say horrible longevity!! Not worth the high $$$</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="624691"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=624691#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent613012" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc613012" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jamiljames"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/934469"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.934469.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jamiljames" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/The-Library-Collection-Opus-VI-14661.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.14661.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Library Collection Opus VI"title="The Library Collection Opus VI"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma613012ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd613012" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/934469">Jamiljames</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2015-07-17">07/17/15 17:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love love love this fragrance. The juniper smells so sharp and clean. From the initial spray there is gin. For me the most interesting thing about this fragrance is how it changes from the gin smell to the smell of sugar and cherries. It does not last so long on skin but it smells wonderful on clothing. I found during the winter months the smell would hold well onto my scarf.<br />
Another thing I feel that is great about this fragrance is how well it can be worn in both summer and winter. Its a great scent to wear in extremely cold winter months as well as nice hot summer days. This is an amazing scent from Penhaligon's and would urge people to try it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="613012"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=613012#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent611622" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc611622" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="joshua224"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/248772"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="joshua224" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma611622ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd611622" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/248772">joshua224</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2015-07-12">07/12/15 06:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wow! One of the best smelling fragrances I have come across out of the 500-600+ tested.<br />
<br />
Sad part is the projection and longevity are non existent. Such a pity!<br />
<br />
9/10 on scent<br />
1/10 on Projection/Longevity<br />
<br />
Ps. This really needs to be in edp concentration...<br />
<br />
EDIT: I need to retract my comment on projection/ longevity, a few people have now told me that this fragrance is quite strong, could it be a case of olfactory fatigue affecting my judgement? One person smelled  me over 6ft away...8hrs after application!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="611622"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=611622#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent583637" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc583637" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="collectyourdead"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/836539"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.836539.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="collectyourdead" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jo-Malone-London/Dark-Amber-Ginger-Lily-3783.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.3783.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dark Amber & Ginger Lily"title="Dark Amber & Ginger Lily"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma583637ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd583637" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/836539">collectyourdead</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2015-04-06">04/06/15 21:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>There was a man at the market wearing this and I passed him a couple times before I simply had to ask him what he was wearing, and this was it. <br />
It's androgynous, velvety, aromatic and charming. <br />
Wonderfully blended.<br />
<br />
8.5-9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="583637"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=583637#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent562594" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc562594" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Strappyshoo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/736520"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.736520.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Strappyshoo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma562594ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd562594" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/736520">Strappyshoo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2015-01-27">01/27/15 05:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was wavering between this and Levantium and went for this in the end. Whilst I think it's very similar to Levantium it doesn't have the scary, screechy sandalwood that just keeps on giving for days...and days. It's a good fragrance. I'm not going to say it's amazing because I don't think its at that level, it's a B rather than an A+. For those who are put off by the longevity issues, yes, it doesn't last massively long...so just reapply :-)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="562594"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=562594#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent560455" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc560455" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="pepperoniann"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/82118"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.82118.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="pepperoniann" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Aqua-Allegoria-Forte-Nerolia-Vetiver-79228.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.79228.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aqua Allegoria Forte Nerolia Vetiver"title="Aqua Allegoria Forte Nerolia Vetiver"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma560455ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd560455" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/82118">pepperoniann</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2015-01-20">01/20/15 14:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>HELP! This stuff is great! I CANNOT move on since I touched Juniper Sling today and my initial plan was to sample 3,4 frags from the two order I received just now! <br />
<br />
In a world filled with too much white musk, bergamot, neroli, vanilla, gardenia, amber and oud... I consider myself incredibly lucky to find a fragrance like this. Juniper Sling is anything but the ordinary definition of a trending fragrance. It is fresh but not from citrus, mint or galbanum. It is woody, but contains no birch, pale wood or sandal. It is warm, but the impression is different from what you get from musk or incense. The spicy notes come from juniper and cinnamon (rather than cloves or carnation commonly seen in florientals) to give it a sparkly, fresh facet. A fragrance newbie like me can still instantly appreciate this witty composition. <br />
<br />
Started out really peppery and fresh with lots of juniper, vetiver, and some hybrid between white and black pepper. Later, the angelica along with orange/orris root bridge the herbal feeling nicely with the spicy cinnamon and cardamom. Here if you apply little (~2 sprays) then JP slowly disappears with just a liiiiiitle bit of cherry/sugar/juniper, but if you dose yourself another 3,4 sprays you get the leather that lasts through the drydown. Incredibly beautiful and intriguing! <br />
<br />
Now I don't really drink gin and tonic, but I'd say this is a perfect scent for people that connect deeply with nature. Someone mentioned Juniper Sling reminded him/her of walking through the forest. As an avid hiker I agree fully. <br />
<br />
Despite poor longevity I might really need to get a full bottle one day.<br />
<br />
[Update Mar.2015] I got a bottle and am so happy! All other pending purchases seem unnecessary now.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="560455"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=560455#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent533512" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
