I wish it smelled like everyone is saying it does!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="533512"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=533512#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent470807" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc470807" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Weihan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/369178"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Weihan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Spice-and-Wood-10101.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.10101.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Spice and Wood"title="Spice and Wood"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma470807ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd470807" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/369178">Weihan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2014-03-28">03/28/14 12:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Absolutely MARVELOUS summer scent! You'll want to bathe in a tub full of Juniper Sling - like Opus 1870 - a true masterpiece from Penhaligon's. The only problem is the weak sillage and the very poor longevity. Perhaps Penhaligon's can be persuaded to bring out a true JS Perfume that overcomes these problems. Otherwise, just carry around an entire bottle and cover yourself in the scent every half hour.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="470807"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=470807#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent459504" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc459504" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Q80"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/698615"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.698615.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Q80" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma459504ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd459504" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/698615">Q80</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2014-02-21">02/21/14 16:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>it smells like heaven to me, as the idea behind this masterpiece is an alcohol cocktails. it has that fresh junipers, mixed with a hint of lime and some mint and sweet syrup, quite natural smell, and i don't smell artificial in it at all... but unfortunately, the longevity is a disaster, it vanishes within an hour max, so you have to apply again to get that charm of freshness love.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="459504"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=459504#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent454970" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc454970" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="husecris"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/515239"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="husecris" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Armani-Code-Golden-Edition-21934.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.21934.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Armani Code Golden Edition"title="Armani Code Golden Edition"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma454970ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd454970" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/515239">husecris</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2014-02-08">02/08/14 13:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is one of the most beautiful scents you'll find. How unfortunate the scent bubble is non-existant. Decant worthy maybe, full bottle no way.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="454970"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=454970#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent427465" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc427465" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Houdini4"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/607493"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.607493.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Houdini4" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Les-Indemodables/Vanille-Havane-Coeur-de-Oud-96892.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.96892.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanille Havane Coeur de Oud"title="Vanille Havane Coeur de Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma427465ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd427465" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/607493">Houdini4</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2013-11-18">11/18/13 02:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sparkling, sweet and beautiful! What a great scent this is... it's like quenching your parched lips with an ice cold, fizzy, San Pellegrino.<br />
To me this is a perfect energizing summer fragrance.<br />
I was expecting a very gin like, juniper vibe which it does deliver but it also gives a sweetness, clean vetiver and a spiced vibe too. It's expertly blended to create a really intriguing fragrance which is uplifting as many have mentioned in their reviews. This stuff will genuinely cheer you up!<br />
The only problem I have and it applies to quite a few Penhaligon's (some of them are stronger) they have poor longevity and projection. This is among a few that are slightly more expensive than the rest of the range and I can't see why really?<br />
I like it that much that I may well add it to my collection despite this.<br />
<br />
Update: I was very tempted to buy this today, instead I was given some samples by a lovely lady in the Penhaligon's shop and will trial it on my skin over the next couple of weeks and see how we go on. It is a summer scent for me so maybe not a priority purchase. Make no mistake though I'm still as in love with it as I was at first sniff...a wonderful fragrance!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="427465"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=427465#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent413753" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc413753" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Roblord"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/307078"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.307078.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Roblord" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma413753ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd413753" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/307078">Roblord</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2013-10-07">10/07/13 12:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This scent smells very nice and calming.  The problem is that it became a skin scent right away and the performance is horrible.  I'll pass, especially at that price point.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="413753"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=413753#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent406788" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc406788" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LookOut"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/462911"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.462911.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LookOut" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Aqua-Allegoria-Orange-Soleia-58967.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.58967.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aqua Allegoria Orange Soleia"title="Aqua Allegoria Orange Soleia"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma406788ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd406788" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/462911">LookOut</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2013-09-15">09/15/13 16:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance isn't half bad. Better than I had expected after watching the notes. It's quite fresh (due to the orange I'm guessing), a little fruity, and somewhat spicy (pepper and cardemom) as well. But most of all, it's woody (dominant vetiver).<br />
<br />
The vetiver is not as dominant as in other woody fragrances, but it's still there. The leather bugs me as well. Or maybe the leather in combination with the vetiver. In any case, it clashes with my skin and prevents it from being wearable for me. But for someone who likes those notes, this can be a very nice fragrance!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="406788"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=406788#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent385772" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc385772" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AndrzejK"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/157748"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.157748.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AndrzejK" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma385772ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd385772" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/157748">AndrzejK</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2013-07-12">07/12/13 11:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The opening is very promising with beautiful notes of fresh juniper with other green notes of angelica, vetiver and spices.<br />
However, the scent is very soft and close to the skin and after 10-15 minutes transforms into a sweet scent (sugar, cherry, orange) which is not that interesting as the beginning.<br />
In the drydown similar to Escentric Molecules 01 on my skin (comparing these two, I prefer Escentric). Nice and that is all.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="385772"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=385772#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent374838" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc372996" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="danceforjoy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/513240"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.513240.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="danceforjoy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Loewe/Aire-Loewe-6293.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6293.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aire Loewe"title="Aire Loewe"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma372996ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd372996" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/513240">danceforjoy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2013-06-02">06/02/13 14:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>*Warning: I am just going to be horrible about this, but isn't that part of the fun of the site?<br />
<br />
This smells like a cherry steak rub that is waaaaay too heavy on the pepper and has been stored in a juniper box with the lid off. This is how it dries, too. My g &amp; ts never smell like somebody poured half-an-inch of pepper in the bottom of the glass before making them, so it did not smell like a g &amp; t to me.<br />
<br />
However, I did find longevity to be quite satisfactory.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="372996"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=372996#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent371414" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; We are often told to apply cologne to shirt collars and cuffs instead of skin to get the true scent - in this case, it's to ensure the scent lasts more than a few moments.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/283374">Go4broke</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2013-05-04">05/04/13 15:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is truly beautiful. First notes I get are pepper, orange and angelica but then the pepper quickly disperses to give way to cherry and cinnamon, as well as a lemon scent although its not listed. The juniper berries are there the whole way through. This shone above most other penhaligons fragrances for me. Silage is average at best and if you spray enough on, you will get 6 hours from this. You do have to spray a lot though. Amazing smell and very unique. Love it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="363018"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=363018#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent360871" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc360871" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="elvisphil"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/49479"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.49479.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="elvisphil" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tauer-Perfumes/05-Incense-Extreme-2996.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2996.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="05 Incense Extreme"title="05 Incense Extreme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma360871ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd360871" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="360871"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=360871#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent359239" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc359239" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="funny creature"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/23167"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.23167.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="funny creature" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma359239ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd359239" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/23167">funny creature</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2013-04-23">04/23/13 11:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This review definitely doesn`t belong to informative ones, as it is an excited one.<br />
<br />
I guess I`ve never smelled anything better before. Sometimes in the evenings when I work at home, especially when I do something boring, I apply this scent and it makes me happy, it makes me fly, it makes the space around me sparkling with joy! Of course it smells like gin and tonic, but in this case it`s a perfect solution. I definitely don`t smell any leather but pepper is very (not too!) loud which makes the perfume so cheerfully spicy.<br />
<br />
Very-very disappointing is that the longevity on me is short like a dream but to my nose it is still the best balanced, the most exquisite perfume ever.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="359239"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=359239#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent356572" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc356572" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="malcner"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/451142"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="malcner" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma356572ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd356572" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/451142">malcner</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2013-04-15">04/15/13 11:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Absolutely beautiful scent, but unbelievably poor longevity! The reason this is so unbelievable is the price....very expensive and you will need to use a lot of it! 100ml will not last you very long at all as you need to reapply it constantly to get any sort of lasting effect from it. I wouldnt even bother with a 50ml bottle, if its even available...? Seriously, lucky if I get an hour before it settles very close to the skin and nobody can smell but you (if you take a bit enough whiff that is).<br />
That said, it is a very nice composition. The initial blast is very similar to voyage d'hermes in that you get a very obvious and delicious gin and tonic. Very refreshing and great for summer I bet. Unfortunately though, the longevity is that poor that its hard to really appreciate what else is going on here after the gin and tonic. If you do examine it closely though, you get a very nice, warm dry down of cinnamon and pepper making this a very warm, sweet and spicy scent when it settles. There are more notes than I mentioned but those are the obvious ones. <br />
I love it , but now that my samples are up I will not be buying a full bottle. It's just not worth it. If it lasted it would be a real winner, but unfortunately it doesn't, and that is the deal breaker for me. Instead I will continue to go for voyage d'hermes as that has an almost identical gin and tonic opening which is why I was drawn to these fragrances in the first place.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="356572"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=356572#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent332084" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc332084" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="PeterWJ"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/394701"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.394701.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="PeterWJ" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma332084ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd332084" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/394701">PeterWJ</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2013-02-03">02/03/13 12:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Fortunately this, to me, is a reminder always to sample before buying. On my skin it's just not coming out right. Only the opening - which lasts just a few minutes on me - seems promising with a blast of spices. Then pure synthetic gastliness takes over. OK, admitted, I haven't tried it on in all kinds of weather and at all seasons. But for now I'll let it rest untill spring. <br />
For all of you Juniper Sling lovers out there, cheer on! And to all of you who know that some fragrances will turn out odd on you, please do sample! There is no reason to get a hold of something because the name sounds interesting.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="332084"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=332084#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent329909" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc329909" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="KladfvbungMicshk"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/367345"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.367345.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="KladfvbungMicshk" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/L-Artisan-Parfumeur/Passage-d-Enfer-4572.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4572.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Passage d'Enfer"title="Passage d'Enfer"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma329909ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd329909" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/367345">KladfvbungMicshk</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2013-01-28">01/28/13 15:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love this perfume. It is the only perfume I've found that has a fragrance reminiscent of walking in the woods - that is, when you don't associate it with gin and tonic. Unfortunately, the scent disappears too quickly and the trace that's left (which smells ethereal) doesn't last for more than an hour. I use it anyway because it's the only perfume I've made a true connection with.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="329909"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=329909#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent321481" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc321481" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mister_chaz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/22287"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.22287.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mister_chaz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Mon-Guerlain-Eau-de-Parfum-Intense-55997.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55997.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mon Guerlain Eau de Parfum Intense"title="Mon Guerlain Eau de Parfum Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma321481ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd321481" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/22287">mister_chaz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2013-01-04">01/04/13 09:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very woody and fresh unisex scent, reminds me of Eau de Lierre by Diptyque - another gin &amp; tonic. Very pleasant and sheer, but most of the time, I have difficulty detecting it on my skin...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="321481"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=321481#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent290178" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc290178" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sherapop"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/17027"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.17027.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sherapop" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Chanel-No-5-L-Eau-38543.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.38543.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Chanel No 5 L'Eau"title="Chanel No 5 L'Eau"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma290178ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd290178" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/17027">sherapop</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2012-10-01">10/01/12 19:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Lots of reviewers have commented on the gin and tonic scent of JUNIPER SLING, but of course what they're really saying is that the scent of gin derives from juniper, which is the focal note, logically enough, of JUNIPER SLING. The little juniper berry appears to have two and only two well-known uses: one to produce gin; the other to cook sauerbraten. For many people these are the sole encounters with this unique-smelling berry. It would be interesting to find out how the Germans feel about this cologne, since it might have a "familiarity breeds contempt" effect upon them. <br />
<br />
I have always thought that gin and tonics smell a bit like hairspray or, I should say, my memory of my mother's hairspray when I was growing up, as I have not smelled that product in quite a while now. So it makes sense that the opening of JUNIPER SLING should remind me, too, a bit of hairspray. I hasten to clarify, however, that in this case the comparison is a compliment, as I rather like the quirky scent of juniper.<br />
<br />
What I like about JUNIPER SLING is that, although it is a somewhat standard cologne, the usual suspects are not the dominant players, so this creation ends up smelling completely different from all of the other colognes. The quality of materials is very good, and the composition is refreshing and invigorating, with a somewhat energizing aromatherapeutic effect.<br />
<br />
It would be easy to overdose on this fragrance because of the dominant juniper note, but as a change from the usual cologne routine, JUNIPER SLING offers a zing of eccentricity. Yes, there is vetiver and citrus and a bit of spice, but really the juniper is the star of the show. There's a real paradox here: good old boy conservatism conjoined with wacky nonconformism. I like it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="290178"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=290178#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent287495" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc287495" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AJ73"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/12746"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.12746.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AJ73" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma287495ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd287495" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81); Very nice.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="287495"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=287495#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent283682" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc283682" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="erilika"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/59241"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.59241.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="erilika" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Demeter-Fragrance/Pruning-Shears-10227.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.10227.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pruning Shears"title="Pruning Shears"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma283682ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd283682" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/59241">erilika</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2012-09-09">09/09/12 04:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Refreshing, like a summer cocktail, herbs and citrus.<br />
Easy to wear, very nice scent!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="283682"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=283682#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent274550" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc274550" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mufidal"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/267556"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.267556.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mufidal" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma274550ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd274550" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/267556">mufidal</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2012-08-09">08/09/12 01:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's a wonderfull scent - fresh and light, don't resembles of alchohol to me. i think it's a one-of-a-kind scent - not to be found everywhere!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="274550"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=274550#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent271089" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc271089" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LSMUA"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/260802"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.260802.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LSMUA" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma271089ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd271089" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/260802">LSMUA</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2012-07-26">07/26/12 03:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>SUCH a nice one! Really does smell like an open bottle of good Gin. On the dry down to me it smells of clean linen though, so no worries about the colleagues getting upset that you may have been at the bottle beforehand. Only sadness is, the lasting power of this scent is SHOCKING!!! half an hour tops, at least on me. Sad, and a shame.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="271089"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=271089#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent270381" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc238005" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Heverton"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/53532"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.53532.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Heverton" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma238005ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd238005" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/53532">Heverton</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2012-04-01">04/01/12 10:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Juniper Sling starts with a spicy combination of pepper and cardamon. After a few minutes a light citric aroma kicks in leaving a very good impression, almost like a drink right in front of you.Trough time a woody accord appears in the base giving some depth to this fragrance. Making things short, an above average fragrance which lacks a little bit of projection and longevity.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="238005"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=238005#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="13266" sentiment="all"></reviews-infinity>
