</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent836497" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc836497" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="esteban747"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/442802"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.442802.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="esteban747" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/So-Blue-30496.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30496.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="So Blue"title="So Blue"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma836497ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd836497" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/442802">esteban747</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-06-28">06/28/17 16:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was having in mind a typical juniper scent.<br />
But this is better. Much better.<br />
It smells like a cologne, clean with just a couple of ingredients. But then it keeps unraveling, showing different notes that start to combine, blend and melt continuously.<br />
A soft dry woody composition. Sublime spiciness and delicate citrus.<br />
It's phenomenal. A real class act.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="836497"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=836497#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent427465" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc427465" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Houdini4"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/607493"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.607493.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Houdini4" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Les-Indemodables/Vanille-Havane-Coeur-de-Oud-96892.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.96892.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanille Havane Coeur de Oud"title="Vanille Havane Coeur de Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma427465ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd427465" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/607493">Houdini4</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2013-11-18">11/18/13 02:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sparkling, sweet and beautiful! What a great scent this is... it's like quenching your parched lips with an ice cold, fizzy, San Pellegrino.<br />
To me this is a perfect energizing summer fragrance.<br />
I was expecting a very gin like, juniper vibe which it does deliver but it also gives a sweetness, clean vetiver and a spiced vibe too. It's expertly blended to create a really intriguing fragrance which is uplifting as many have mentioned in their reviews. This stuff will genuinely cheer you up!<br />
The only problem I have and it applies to quite a few Penhaligon's (some of them are stronger) they have poor longevity and projection. This is among a few that are slightly more expensive than the rest of the range and I can't see why really?<br />
I like it that much that I may well add it to my collection despite this.<br />
<br />
Update: I was very tempted to buy this today, instead I was given some samples by a lovely lady in the Penhaligon's shop and will trial it on my skin over the next couple of weeks and see how we go on. It is a summer scent for me so maybe not a priority purchase. Make no mistake though I'm still as in love with it as I was at first sniff...a wonderful fragrance!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="427465"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=427465#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent560455" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc560455" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="pepperoniann"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/82118"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.82118.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="pepperoniann" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Aqua-Allegoria-Forte-Nerolia-Vetiver-79228.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.79228.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aqua Allegoria Forte Nerolia Vetiver"title="Aqua Allegoria Forte Nerolia Vetiver"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma560455ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd560455" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/82118">pepperoniann</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2015-01-20">01/20/15 14:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>HELP! This stuff is great! I CANNOT move on since I touched Juniper Sling today and my initial plan was to sample 3,4 frags from the two order I received just now! <br />
<br />
In a world filled with too much white musk, bergamot, neroli, vanilla, gardenia, amber and oud... I consider myself incredibly lucky to find a fragrance like this. Juniper Sling is anything but the ordinary definition of a trending fragrance. It is fresh but not from citrus, mint or galbanum. It is woody, but contains no birch, pale wood or sandal. It is warm, but the impression is different from what you get from musk or incense. The spicy notes come from juniper and cinnamon (rather than cloves or carnation commonly seen in florientals) to give it a sparkly, fresh facet. A fragrance newbie like me can still instantly appreciate this witty composition. <br />
<br />
Started out really peppery and fresh with lots of juniper, vetiver, and some hybrid between white and black pepper. Later, the angelica along with orange/orris root bridge the herbal feeling nicely with the spicy cinnamon and cardamom. Here if you apply little (~2 sprays) then JP slowly disappears with just a liiiiiitle bit of cherry/sugar/juniper, but if you dose yourself another 3,4 sprays you get the leather that lasts through the drydown. Incredibly beautiful and intriguing! <br />
<br />
Now I don't really drink gin and tonic, but I'd say this is a perfect scent for people that connect deeply with nature. Someone mentioned Juniper Sling reminded him/her of walking through the forest. As an avid hiker I agree fully. <br />
<br />
Despite poor longevity I might really need to get a full bottle one day.<br />
<br />
[Update Mar.2015] I got a bottle and am so happy! All other pending purchases seem unnecessary now.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="560455"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=560455#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent611622" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc611622" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="joshua224"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/248772"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="joshua224" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma611622ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd611622" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/248772">joshua224</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2015-07-12">07/12/15 06:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wow! One of the best smelling fragrances I have come across out of the 500-600+ tested.<br />
<br />
Sad part is the projection and longevity are non existent. Such a pity!<br />
<br />
9/10 on scent<br />
1/10 on Projection/Longevity<br />
<br />
Ps. This really needs to be in edp concentration...<br />
<br />
EDIT: I need to retract my comment on projection/ longevity, a few people have now told me that this fragrance is quite strong, could it be a case of olfactory fatigue affecting my judgement? One person smelled  me over 6ft away...8hrs after application!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="611622"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=611622#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent359239" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc359239" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="funny creature"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/23167"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.23167.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="funny creature" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma359239ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd359239" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/23167">funny creature</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2013-04-23">04/23/13 11:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This review definitely doesn`t belong to informative ones, as it is an excited one.<br />
<br />
I guess I`ve never smelled anything better before. Sometimes in the evenings when I work at home, especially when I do something boring, I apply this scent and it makes me happy, it makes me fly, it makes the space around me sparkling with joy! Of course it smells like gin and tonic, but in this case it`s a perfect solution. I definitely don`t smell any leather but pepper is very (not too!) loud which makes the perfume so cheerfully spicy.<br />
<br />
Very-very disappointing is that the longevity on me is short like a dream but to my nose it is still the best balanced, the most exquisite perfume ever.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="359239"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=359239#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="13266" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-negative-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Negative Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent843561" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc843561" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="beckhen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/921245"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="beckhen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/FZOTIC/Pantoum-69086.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.69086.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pantoum"title="Pantoum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma843561ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd843561" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/921245">beckhen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-07-21">07/21/17 15:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>When I am on a very specific perfume quest, I'm most often disappointed. In this case, I was searching for a true gin and tonic scent. Fresh, sharp, herbal. I fell in love with this one sprayed on a blotter. And on my skin, I am still smitten by the heavy juniper opening.<br />
<br />
But then this fragrance veers off into a completely different cocktail. Not exactly false advertising, because it's all there in the notes pyramid. There's an intense freshly cracked pepper phase, and then cherry and brown sugar notes make themselves known over a gentle musk. Okay, but not the droid I'm looking for.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="843561"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=843561#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent668161" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc668161" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="numcks"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/82392"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.82392.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="numcks" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Etat-Libre-d-Orange/Fat-Electrician-Semi-Modern-Vetiver-7139.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.7139.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fat Electrician Semi-Modern Vetiver"title="Fat Electrician Semi-Modern Vetiver"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma668161ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd668161" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/82392">numcks</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-01-17">01/17/16 10:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Another Oliver Cresp work that leaves me disappointed. Jungle pour homme by Kenzo is another creation as is Armand Bosi  Homme. All share the same thin, pale, construction that leaves you straining to detect anything and wanting more. This is the worst of the three - barely there - homeopathic perfumery. Either Oliver has a bloodhound's sense of smell, or he is too reticent and apologetic. What little I can pick up is generally okay, especially early on when there is some gin-fizziness. A pale touch of anise is also nice, but a boring woody amber base smells generic, not unlike pure iso E (think Escentric Molecules 01). A yawn.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="668161"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=668161#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent372996" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc372996" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="danceforjoy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/513240"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.513240.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="danceforjoy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Loewe/Aire-Loewe-6293.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6293.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aire Loewe"title="Aire Loewe"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma372996ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd372996" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/513240">danceforjoy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2013-06-02">06/02/13 14:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>*Warning: I am just going to be horrible about this, but isn't that part of the fun of the site?<br />
<br />
This smells like a cherry steak rub that is waaaaay too heavy on the pepper and has been stored in a juniper box with the lid off. This is how it dries, too. My g &amp; ts never smell like somebody poured half-an-inch of pepper in the bottom of the glass before making them, so it did not smell like a g &amp; t to me.<br />
<br />
However, I did find longevity to be quite satisfactory.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="372996"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=372996#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2140543" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2140543" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="EarlGraphite"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1983203"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1983203.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="EarlGraphite" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Portrayal-Man-54460.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.54460.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Portrayal Man"title="Portrayal Man"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2140543ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2140543" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1983203">EarlGraphite</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-29">04/29/24 19:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Delicious gin and tonic that disappeared from my skin without a trace in less than 15 minutes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="2140543"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=2140543#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent678764" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc678764" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="froogle_jimmy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/947753"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.947753.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="froogle_jimmy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/The-Art-Of-Shaving/Green-Lavender-Cologne-Intense-42174.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.42174.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Green Lavender Cologne Intense"title="Green Lavender Cologne Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma678764ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd678764" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/947753">froogle_jimmy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-02-18">02/18/16 07:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The opening of this fragrance is fantastic....possibly my favorite 45minute opening of any fragrance. the scent of gin and tonic is playful and enticing and makes me just want to smell this all day.<br />
<br />
However once this cologne has dried down it becomes a lack lustre mess. just light florals and some woods with nothing else. An empty shell of what could have been a fantastic fragrance. Not only that it is completely gone by 4 hours....if it even makes it that long.<br />
<br />
So sad. It could have been amazing, but alas it is a pass for me.<br />
<br />
Opening 10/10<br />
Longevity 3/10<br />
overall performance 3/10<br />
<br />
5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="13266"comment_id="678764"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html?ccid=678764#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="13266" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>

<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x250" id="fragranticacom_perfume_mrec_1" v-pre>
</div>
        
        <div class="strike-title"><span>Perfume Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="latest-list flex-container">
        <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/m.48133.jpg" style="width: 60px; height: 64px; margin-right: 0.5em; flex-shrink: 0"/>
        <a href="/perfume/Hermes/Hermessence-Cardamusc-48133.html#cc2367117"><span class="link-span"></span>
            <span class="brand">Herms</span><br>            <span class="ztworowseclipse">Hermessence Cardamusc</span>
        </a>
        <span class="avatar-tip" data-tooltip aria-haspopup="true" data-show-on="medium" data-disable-hover="false"
              tabindex="1" title="Cardamusc is a beautiful aromatic cardamon softened with powdery musk. As others have said- it&#039;s meant as a layering item. (But I like it on its own also). It is very expensive, true. But also, if you have only tried a decant or a store sample (the bottle in store are fully open), the real...">by
            <em>finnybunnycat</em> <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/s.2127995.jpg"
                                                     style="width: 2em; height: 2em; border-radius: 1em"></span>
    </div>
    <div class="latest-list flex-container">
        <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/m.228.jpg" style="width: 60px; height: 64px; margin-right: 0.5em; flex-shrink: 0"/>

            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/perfume/Armaf/Club-de-Nuit-Intense-Man-34696.html" class="en2inter">Club de Nuit Intense Man Armaf</a>
        </span>
    </div>

        </div>

    }

    let done_flickity = false;
</script>

                if (lang == 'EN') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.com") });
                if (lang == 'DE') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.de").replace(/designers/, "Designer").replace(/perfume/, "Parfum") });
                if (lang == 'ES') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.es").replace(/designers/, "disenador") });
                if (lang == 'FR') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.fr").replace(/designers/, "designer").replace(/perfume/, "parfum") });
                if (lang == 'CS') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.cz").replace(/designers/, "designer") });
                if (lang == 'IT') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.it").replace(/designers/, "designer") });
                if (lang == 'RU') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.ru") });
                if (lang == 'PL') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.pl").replace(/designers/, "marki").replace(/perfume/, "perfumy") });
                if (lang == 'PT') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.com.br").replace(/designers/, "desenhista") });
                if (lang == 'EL') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.gr").replace(/designers/, "designer") });
                if (lang == 'ZH') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.asia").replace(/designers/, "designer") });
                if (lang == 'NL') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.nl").replace(/designers/, "ontwerper").replace(/perfume/, "parfum") });
                if (lang == 'SR') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.punmiris.com").replace(/designers/, "dizajner").replace(/perfume/, "parfem") });
                if (lang == 'RO') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.ro").replace(/designers/, "creatori").replace(/perfume/, "parfum") });
                if (lang == 'AR') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragranticarabia.com").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'UK') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.ua").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'MN') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.mn").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'HE') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.co.il").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
            });
</script>


<script  data-cfasync="false">
    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFFe5cbbe5e5f689826b719ace22a5b2a11');
        });
    }
</script>
<script>
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $('#fragranticaloader').fadeOut(20);
    });
</script>
</body>
</html>
